        set GD_Artifacts.A_Item_Unique.Artifact_Opportunity AttributeSlotEffects ((SlotName="Effect1",bExternalSlot=True,bRunEffectsAsSkill=False,AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.FootSpeed',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Artifacts.BalanceAttributes.Init_ModifierBase_Linear',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.002000),PerGradeUpgrade=(BaseValueConstant=0.030000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),bIncludeInFunStats=False,bIncludeAlliesAsTarget=False,bEnforceMinimumGrade=False,bEnforceMaximumGrade=False,MinimumGrade=0,MaximumGrade=12,TargetInstanceDataName=))

        set GD_Artifacts.A_Item_Unique.Artifact_Opportunity:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_AttributeEffect_16 AttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.FootSpeed',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-60.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

        set GD_Artifacts.Body.Body_Opportunity:AttributePresentationDefinition_0 Description Increases [skill]Movement Speed[-skill].

        set GD_AttributePresentation.Artifacts.AttrPresent_ArtifactShopTimerRate Description Movement Speed

    #</UVHM tweaks - +150% DoT Damage in UVHM>

    #<mods>

        #<Gear Overhaul 1.25>

            The Gear Overhaul is a several-month joint venture between Orudeon, AngrierPat, the_Nocturni, Zububu, LightChaosman, Mike, FromDarkHell et al.

            This mod extensively tweaks or overhauls (almost) every brand in the game to improve competitiveness of low-performing items or brands, as well as create sensible or synergistic changes.

            Overall, your gun choice, accessory choice, and even shield choice should matter a little bit less.

            Due to the inclusion of hotfixes, this mod requires FilterTool (or careful, manual merging of hotfixes) to install and use correctly.

            #<Extended Description>

                Version 1.2 adds the following:

                Laser Pistols 1.0

                Relic Overhaul 1.0. PLEASE READ ALL DOCUMENTATION CAREFULLY, THIS MOD INCLUDES SEVERE SANITY CHECKS.

                Version 1.2 updates the following:

                Hyperion Brand Tweaks

                Vladof Brand Tweaks

                Another Spiker Mod

                Jakobs Brand Tweaks

                Tediore Brand Overhaul

                Maliwan Brand Tweaks

                Version 1.1 adds the following:

                Hyperion Brand Tweaks

                Bandit Brand Tweaks

                Torgue Brand Tweaks

                Version 1.1 updates the following:

                Bayonets On Slot 2. PLEASE READ ALL DOCUMENTATION CAREFULLY, THIS MOD INCLUDES SEVERE SANITY CHECKS.

                Better Grenade Tweaks by the_Nocturni and Orudeon

                Shield Behavior Overhaul 1.2 by Orudeon, the_Nocturni, and LightChaosman

                Better Splatguns by Orudeon

                Jakobs Brand Tweaks by Orudeon

                Dahl Brand Tweaks 1.2 by Orudeon

                Version 1.0 includes the following:

                Prefix Rework v2 by AngrierPat

                Another Spiker Mod by Orudeon

                Aesthetic Stocks by AngrierPat

                Shield Stat Tweaks by Orudeon

                Tediore Brand Overhaul by Orudeon

                Maliwan Brand Tweaks 1.0 by Orudeon

                Vladof Brand Tweaks by Orudeon

                Restricted Slag Spawns by Zububu

                All compatibility selections are automatically configured to the most compatible, but please check each sub-mod independently for any configuration needs (especially Bayonets on Slot 2 and Better Splatguns)

            #</Extended Description>

            #<mods>

                #<Prefix Rework 2.0>

                    #<Handguns>

                        #<Stock and Accuracy Combined on Stock>

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Stock_Stability AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="AccuracyMax",GradeIncrease=10,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyMin",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=10,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponAccuracyImpulse",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True))

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Stock_Stability:AttributePresentationDefinition_0 NoConstraintText Increased [skill]weapon stability[-skill] and [skill]accuracy[-skill].

                        #</Stock and Accuracy Combined on Stock>

                        #<Accuracy changed to Crit>

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Laser_Accuracy WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectileSpeedMultiplier',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCriticalHitBonus',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.250000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Laser_Accuracy WeaponCardAttributes ((Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCriticalHitBonus',PriorityIncrease=0.500000))

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Critical

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Bandit.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Splurt

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Raddled

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Hyperion.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Stimulating

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Straight Shootin'

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Maliwan.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Punctuating

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Tediore.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Special Promotion:

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Torgue.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName KerPowza

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Laser_Accuracy PartName Holy

                        #</Accuracy changed to Crit>

                        #<Mag Prefix Buff to Reload Speed>

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Tech_1_Mag AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=9,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponReloadSpeed",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Mag Prefix Buff to Reload Speed>

                        #<Remove Damage nerf to Fire Rate Prefix>

                            #<Changed the Fire Rate Prefix to give Jacobs a 3 round burst, at the cost of Mag and slightly less damage>

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Tech_3_Firerate WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAdditionalRicochets',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=2.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAutomaticBurstCount',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=2.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.150000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.200000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.200000)))

                            #</Changed the Fire Rate Prefix to give Jacobs a 3 round burst, at the cost of Mag and slightly less damage>

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Tech_3_Firerate AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponFireRate",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Remove Damage nerf to Fire Rate Prefix>

                        #<Lessened the downsides of the Double Accessory>

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Laser_Double WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.850000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponPerShotAccuracyImpulse',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Hyperion',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-4.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponPerShotAccuracyImpulse',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.400000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.600000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Maliwan',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Accessory.Pistol_Accessory_Laser_Double AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="AccuracyMin",GradeIncrease=-3,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=-3,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponFireRate",GradeIncrease=-8,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=-5,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Lessened the downsides of the Double Accessory>

                    #</Handguns>

                    #<AR>

                        #<Stability and Accuracy Combined on Stability>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_Foregrip_Stability AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponAccuracyImpulse",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyRegen",GradeIncrease=7,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=7,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyMin",GradeIncrease=7,bActivateSlot=True))

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_Foregrip_Stability:AttributePresentationDefinition_0 NoConstraintText Increased [skill]weapon stability[-skill] and [skill]accuracy[-skill].

                        #</Stability and Accuracy Combined on Stability>

                        #<Mag Accessory given Reload Speed>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_Shroud1_MagSize AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=9,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponReloadSpeed",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Mag Accessory given Reload Speed>

                        #<Accuracy Accessory turned into a Crit Accessory>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_Shroud2_Accuracy WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCriticalHitBonus',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.250000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix.Prefix_Shroud2_Accuracy PartName Critical

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Bandit.Prefix_Shroud2_Accuracy PartName Crytikall

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Shroud2_Accuracy PartName Veteran

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Shroud2_Accuracy PartName Deadshot

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Torgue.Prefix_Shroud2_Accuracy PartName FACIAL

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Shroud2_Accuracy PartName Severe

                        #</Accuracy Accessory turned into a Crit Accessory>

                        #<Bullet Speed Accessory added a small amount of Ammo Regen>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_Box_BulletSpeed ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Combat_Rifle.Ammo_Combat_Rifle_RegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_Box_BulletSpeed WeaponCardAttributes ((Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Combat_Rifle.Ammo_Combat_Rifle_RegenerationRate',PriorityIncrease=0.500000))

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_Box_BulletSpeed AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponFireRate",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=True))

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix.Prefix_Box_BulletSpeed PartName Ammo Regen

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Bandit.Prefix_Box_BulletSpeed PartName aDDiNg?

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Box_BulletSpeed PartName Endless

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Box_BulletSpeed PartName Endless

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Torgue.Prefix_Box_BulletSpeed PartName OVERCOMPENSATING

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Box_BulletSpeed PartName Unending

                        #</Bullet Speed Accessory added a small amount of Ammo Regen>

                        #<Wild Accessory significantly buffed to have less of a downside, but slight Damage/FR nerf to compensate>

                            #<Wild makes jakobs fire an additional shot at the cost of some damage and mag size>

                                set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_BanditClamp_Wild WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAutomaticBurstCount',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.200000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-4.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.200000)))

                            #</Wild makes jakobs fire an additional shot at the cost of some damage and mag size>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_BanditClamp_Wild AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=-5,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponFireRate",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Wild Accessory significantly buffed to have less of a downside, but slight Damage/FR nerf to compensate>

                    #</AR>

                    #<Shotguns>

                        #<Buffed MoonClip Accessory to have a slight reload buff>

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Accessory.SG_Accessory_MoonClip AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=7,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponReloadSpeed",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Buffed MoonClip Accessory to have a slight reload buff>

                        #<ShotgunShell Accessory bonuses increased slightly>

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Accessory.SG_Accessory_ShotgunShell AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponReloadSpeed",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponFireRate",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</ShotgunShell Accessory bonuses increased slightly>

                        #<Tech3 Accessory Buffed Mag and Reload Speed, more Reload than MoonClip>

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Accessory.SG_Accessory_Tech_3 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponReloadSpeed",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponFireRate",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Tech3 Accessory Buffed Mag and Reload Speed, more Reload than MoonClip>

                        #<Tech1 Accessory significantly reduce the Damage penalty and slightly increased the Fire Rate>

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Accessory.SG_Accessory_Tech_1 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=-2,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponFireRate",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponZoomFOV",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Tech1 Accessory significantly reduce the Damage penalty and slightly increased the Fire Rate>

                    #</Shotguns>

                    #<SMGs>

                        #<Stability Accessory combined with Accuracy Accessory, and slightly buffed>

                            set GD_Weap_SMG.Accessory.SMG_Accessory_Stock1_Stabilized AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponAccuracyImpulse",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyMax",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyMin",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True))

                        #</Stability Accessory combined with Accuracy Accessory, and slightly buffed>

                        #<Change the Accuracy Accessory to a Critical Accessory>

                        #</Buff to Reload Accessory to have a larger Mag Size bonus, and slightly more Reload Speed>

                    #</SMGs>

                        #<Aaron's Sniper Regen Replaces the Accuracy Accessory>

                            ########

                            By Aaron0000

                            Replaces the accuracy accessory of Sniper Rifles. Changes it to slowly regenerate ammo instead of increasing accuracy.

                            Comes with custom prefixes: Jakobs = Bountiful, Dahl =Munitional, Hyperion = Rational, Maliwan = Prepared, Vladof = Production.

                            ########

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Accessory.Sniper_Accessory_Bipod1_Accuracy ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Sniper_Rifle.Ammo_Sniper_Rifle_RegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.40000)),(AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Sniper_Rifle.Ammo_Sniper_Rifle_RegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Vladof',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.250000)),(AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Sniper_Rifle.Ammo_Sniper_Rifle_RegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.150000)))

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Accessory.Sniper_Accessory_Bipod1_Accuracy AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponAccuracyImpulse",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="AccuracyMin",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False))

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Bipod1_Accuracy PartName Munitioning

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Hyperion.Prefix_Bipod1_Accuracy PartName Digistructing

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Bipod1_Accuracy PartName Bountiful

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Maliwan.Prefix_Bipod1_Accuracy PartName Regenerating

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Bipod1_Accuracy PartName Production

                        #</Aaron's Sniper Regen Replaces the Accuracy Accessory>

                        #<Mag Accessory changed to a general stat boost Accessory>

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Mount1_Mag PartName Field-Tested

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Hyperion.Prefix_Mount1_Mag PartName R&D

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Mount1_Mag PartName Pristine

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Maliwan.Prefix_Mount1_Mag PartName Experimental

                            set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Mount1_Mag PartName Serviced

                            #</Mag Accessory changed to a general stat bost Accessory>

                            #</Snipers>

                            #</Prefix Rework>

                #<Aesthetic Stocks 1.0a>

                    Equalizes the attributes of all stocks to be equal to the objectively best one in each category, making stocks completely aesthetic.

                    Coded by AngrierPat

                    Changelog:

                    V1.0a

                    Now includes optional modules that makes all stocks look like the one their stats replicate. Disabled by default. Configurable by weapon category.

                    #<Assault Rifles>

                        set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Stock.AR_Stock_Bandit AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="AccuracyMin",GradeIncrease=-6,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyMax",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyRegen",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponAccuracyImpulse",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True))

                #<Another Spiker Mod 1.0a>

                    Redesigns Spikers (E-Tech pistols) into hand-held micro-rocket launchers. All spikers deal heavily increased damage, explode sooner, and now deal your choice of Reaper, Grenade, or Rocket (vanilla) splash.

                    To compensate for this dramatic increase in damage, Bandit, Dahl, and Vladof Spikers have higher recoil, higher burst delay, and lower fire rate (respectively) to keep them in line with other brands while retaining their brand signature.

                    Additionally, Maliwan spikers have massively increased elemental chance and damage at the expense of lower DPS.

                    A very special thank you to LightChaosman for coding the zero-delay detonation code.

                    You must install this with LightChaosman's Filter Tool or manually merge the hotfixes at the end of the document. Includes Jakobs and Torgue E-Tech compatibility baseline.

                    #<Detonation Code (Required)>

                        #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-NoDelaySpikers1"</key><value>",GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0,BehaviorSequences[0].BehaviorData2,,((Behavior=ProjectileBehavior_SetStickyGrenade'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.ProjectileBehavior_SetStickyGrenade_6',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0)),(Behavior=Behavior_DebugMessage'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_DebugMessage_6',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=196610),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0)),(Behavior=ProjectileBehavior_Detonate'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.ProjectileBehavior_Detonate_6',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=65537)),(Behavior=Behavior_ChangeInstanceDataSwitch'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_ChangeInstanceDataSwitch_4',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0)),(Behavior=ProjectileBehavior_Attach'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.ProjectileBehavior_Attach_6',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=327683),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=65537)),(Behavior=Behavior_Delay'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Delay_15',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=524289),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0)),(Behavior=Behavior_Explode'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_6',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=0),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=65537)),(Behavior=ProjectileBehavior_Attach'GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.ProjectileBehavior_Attach_7',LinkedVariables=(ArrayIndexAndLength=589828),OutputLinks=(ArrayIndexAndLength=65537)))"</value><on>

                    #</Detonation Code (Required)>

                    #<Splash Format><MUT>

                        #<Grenade>

                            #set GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_6 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'<off>

                        #</Grenade>

                        #<Rocket (Vanilla)>

                            #set GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_6 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                        #</Rocket (Vanilla)>

                        #<Pistol (Reaper)>

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_6 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Pistol'

                        #</Pistol (Reaper)>

                    #</Splash Format>

                    #<Barrel>

                        set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Alien WeaponAttributeEffects                     #<Radius>

                        set GD_Weap_Pistol.Projectiles.Projectile_Spiker:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_6 DamageRadiusFormula (BaseValueConstant=150.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    #</Radius>

                #</Another Spiker Mod 1.0a>

                #<Bayonets on Slot 2 1.35>

                    Changes accessories so bayonets never spawn on slot 1, only on slot 2, freeing up your weapon to have another accessory in addition to a bayonet. Does not despawn existing bayonets on slot 1.

                    Does not affect certain weapons. Certain guns - mostly uniques - now have a guaranteed accessory.

                    Changelog:

                    V1.35

                    All pearlescents should now always spawn with a bayonet.

                    Rubi and Grog Nozzle now always spawn with a bayonet.

                    V1.3

                    Damned Cowboy, Scorpio, Greed, Rex, Little Evie, Tattler, Lascaux, Hydra, Sledge's Shotgun, Elephant Gun, and Buffalo now always spawn with a blade and have double melee damage.

                    Fixed a bug that caused Dahl blue pistols to not be affected.

                    #<Extended Description>

                        Example Guns:

                        Law (Now can have any accessory)

                        Rubi and Grog Nozzle (Your choice of always has a blade or sometimes has a blade)

                        Tattler (Now can have any accessory)

                        Cobra (Always has an accessory)

                        Pimpernel (Always has an accessory)

                        Coded by: Orudeon

                        With assistance from: the_Nocturni, LightChaosman

                        WARNING: This mod alters the fundamental spawning rules of the game. Guns that spawn with a bayonet while this mod is active violate the sanity check. Do not deactivate this mod after using it. Please run this mod as early in your load order as possible.

                        Please keep in mind that any mod that alters WeaponPartListCollectionDefinitions may be incompatible with this.

                    #</Extended Description>

                    #<Pistol Bayonets>

                        #<Accessories>

                            #<Bandit>

                            #</Vladof>

                        #</Accessories>

                        #<Prefixes>

                            Sets all pistol bayonet titles to minimal priority. If a pistol has two accessories, the title should not display the bayonet. This code is a workaround for bayonet titles taking priority over the primary accessory.

                            #<Code>

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Torgue.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Hyperion.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Bandit.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Tediore.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Maliwan.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                            #</Code>

                        #</Prefixes>

                    #</Pistol Bayonets>

                    #<Assault Rifle Bayonets>

                        #<Accessories>

                            #</Jakobs>

                        #</Accessories>

                        #<Prefixes>

                            Sets all assault rifle bayonet titles to minimal priority. If an assault rifle has two accessories, the title should not display the bayonet. This code is a workaround for bayonet titles taking priority over the primary accessory.

                            #<Code>

                                set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Bandit.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Torgue.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                            #</Code>

                        #</Prefixes>

                    #</Assault Rifle Bayonets>

                    #<SMG Bayonets>

                        #<Accessories>

                            #<Bandit>

                            #</Tediore>

                        #</Accessories>

                        #<Prefixes>

                            Sets all SMG bayonet titles to minimal priority. If an SMG has two accessories, the title should not display the bayonet. This code is a workaround for bayonet titles taking priority over the primary accessory.

                            #<Code>

                                set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Prefix_Hyperion.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95000

                                set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95000

                                set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Prefix_Tediore.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95000

                                set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Prefix_Maliwan.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95000

                                set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Prefix_Bandit.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95000

                                set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Prefix.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.3

                            #</Code>

                        #</Prefixes>

                    #</SMG Bayonets>

                    #<Shotgun Bayonets>

                        #</Accessories>

                        #<Prefixes>

                            Sets all shotgun bayonet titles to minimal priority. If a shotgun has two accessories, the title should not display the bayonet. This code is a workaround for bayonet titles taking priority over the primary accessory.

                            #<Code>

                                set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Name.Prefix_Torgue.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Name.Prefix_Bandit.Prefix_Bayonet_2 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Name.Prefix_Hyperion.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Name.Prefix_Tediore.Prefix_Bayonet_1 Priority 0.95

                            #</Code>

                        #</Prefixes>

                    #</Shotgun Bayonets>

                    #<Sniper Rifle Bayonets>

                        #</Accessories>

                        #<Prefixes>

                            Sets all sniper rifle bayonet titles to minimal priority. If a sniper rifle has two accessories, the title should not display the bayonet. This code is a workaround for bayonet titles taking priority over the primary accessory.

                            #<Code>

                                set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Dahl.Prefix_Bayonet1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Maliwan.Prefix_Bayonet1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Hyperion.Prefix_Bayonet1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Jakobs.Prefix_Bayonet1 Priority 0.95

                                set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Name.Prefix_Vladof.Prefix_Bayonet1 Priority 0.95

                            #</Code>

                        #</Prefixes>

                    #</Sniper Rifle Bayonets>

                #<Bandit Brand Tweaks 1.1a>

                    Improves quality of life issues of several Bandit weapons to increase competitiveness. Additionally, all Bandit guns now sport an extra shot chance based on gun type to synergize with their massive magazines.

                    #<Assault Rifles>

                        Increases responsiveness of Bandit assault rifles by slightly increasing all accuracy stats, fire rate, and reload speed. Magazine lowered slightly to compensate.

                    #<Orudeon's GrenadeTweaks>

                        Enhances most common grenade types to improve usability or brand differentiation. This mod is designed for use with the_Nocturni's Better Grenades but may be used standalone. You may load them in any order, however any mod that alters ExternalAttributeEffects or AttributeSlotUpgrades on grenade materials is incompatible with this mod.

                        Coded by: Orudeon

                        #<Bandit>

                            Bandit grenades increase grenade capacity (+1 for Skyrocket, +2 for white, +3 for Green, +4 for Blue/Fustercluck, +5 for Purple)

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit_2_Uncommon ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit_3_Rare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit_4_VeryRare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Title.Title_SkyRocket ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        #</Bandit>

                        #<Dahl>

                            Increases common Dahl grenade damage by half a rarity.

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Dahl_4_VeryRare AttributeSlotUpgrades (SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False)

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Dahl_3_Rare AttributeSlotUpgrades (SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False)

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Dahl AttributeSlotUpgrades (SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False)

                        #</Dahl>

                        #<Torgue>

                            Increases common Torgue grenade child count by one, to a total of three over similar-part Bandit grenades..

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Torgue AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="ChildCount",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Torgue_2_Uncommon AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="ChildCount",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Torgue_4_VeryRare AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="ChildCount",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                        #</Torgue>

                        #<Tediore>

                            Tediore grenades replenish over time, starting at one every twenty seconds for whites, going all the way to one every ten seconds for purples. This data is included from Tediore Brand Overhaul.

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior_3_Rare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.0769231,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                        #</Tediore>

                        #<Maliwan>

                            Increases the O-Negative's Child Grenade count by five (to a range of eleven to thirteen) while reverting the fuse timer change introduced in the Unofficial Community Patch to counter the child grenade and power increase. This data is included from Maliwan Brand Tweaks.

                            #<Fuse Timer>

                                set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.ONegative.Iris_Seraph_GrenadeMod_ONegative_Part_Damage7 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=7,bActivateSlot=True))

                                set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.ONegative.Iris_Seraph_GrenadeMod_ONegative_Part_Damage6 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True))

                            #</Fuse Timer>

                            #<Child Grenades>

                        #</Maliwan>

                #</Better Grenade Tweaks>

                #<Better Splatguns 1.4a>

                    Alters Splatguns to have bonus projectiles, bonus velocity, bonus fire rate, no self-damage, and no gravity. This mod eliminates the spawn chance of Tech 2 (Critical) from all Splatguns due to it being useless. Please note this does not despawn existing Tech 2. Additionally, all Splatguns allow you to pick whether Splatguns do Reaper, Rocket, or Grenade splash. Please choose carefully, as these are not inter-compatible.

                    This mod is incompatible with Aaron0000's Splitters. This mod contains compatibility code for Bayonets On Slot 2 and Jakobs/Torgue Etech compatibility code is included in the Generic barrel section. Enable this after JTET if you use it.

                    Coded by Orudeon with major assistance from the_Nocturni. It is highly recommended you use LightChaosman's Filter Tool to install this.

                    Changelog:

                    V1.4a

                    Lowered Bandit splatgun damage by 16.66% (they were severely overperforming).

                    V1.4

                    Updated Jakobs and Torgue E-Tech compatibility code. Jakobs now shoots 4 projectiles with 20% faster velocity, while Torgue shoots 6 projectiles.

                    V1.2

                    Reorganized all configuration data to make it much easier to configure things in LightChaosman's Filter Tool.

                    V1.1

                    Move all self-damage to its own category for easy toggling.

                    V1.05

                    Added missing compatibility code for generic and Hyperion barrels.

                    #<Self-Damage>

                        Eliminates all Splatgun self-damage. Disable this if your build (e.g. Backdraft Maya) depends on self-damage.

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_8 InstigatorSelfDamageScale 0.000000

                        set GD_Iris_Weapons.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_SlowHand:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5 InstigatorSelfDamageScale 0.00000

                        set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_97 InstigatorSelfDamageScale 0.0000

                        set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_98 InstigatorSelfDamageScale 0.0000

                        set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5  InstigatorSelfDamageScale 0.00000

                    #</Self-Damage>

                    #<Splash Format>

                        Allows you to pick the kind of splash Splatguns do based on barrel. Defaults to Reaper if not configured.

                        #<General Barrel><MUT>

                            #<Grenade>

                                #set GD_Iris_Weapons.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_SlowHand:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5  DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'<off>

                            #</Grenade>

                            #<Rocket>

                                #set GD_Iris_Weapons.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_SlowHand:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5  DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                            #</Rocket>

                            #<Shotgun (Reaper)>

                                set GD_Iris_Weapons.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_SlowHand:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5  DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Shotgun'

                            #</Shotgun (Reaper)>

                        #</General Barrel>

                        #<Hyperion><MUT>

                            #<Grenade>

                                #set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_97 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'<off>

                                #set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_98 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'<off>

                            #</Grenade>

                            #<Rocket>

                                #set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_97 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                                #set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_98 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                            #</Rocket>

                            #<Shotgun (Reaper)>

                                set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_97 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Shotgun'

                                set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_98 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Shotgun'

                            #</Shotgun (Reaper)>

                        #</Hyperion>

                        #<Slow Hand><MUT>

                            #<Grenade>

                                #set GD_Iris_Weapons.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_SlowHand:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5  DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'<off>

                            #</Grenade>

                            #<Rocket>

                                #set GD_Iris_Weapons.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_SlowHand:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5  DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                            #</Rocket>

                            #<Shotgun (Reaper)>

                                set GD_Iris_Weapons.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_SlowHand:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_5  DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Shotgun'

                            #</Shotgun (Reaper)>

                        #</Slow Hand>

                        #<Retcher><MUT>

                            #<Grenade>

                                #set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_8 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'<off>

                            #</Grenade>

                            #<Rocket>

                                #set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_8 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                            #</Rocket>

                            #<Shotgun (Reaper)>

                                set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_8 DamageSource Class'WillowGame.WillowDmgSource_Shotgun'

                            #</Shotgun (Reaper)>

                        #</Retcher>

                    #</Splash Format>

                    #<Accessory Spawning><MUT>

                    #<Common E-Techs>

                        Eliminates self-damage and gravity, and increases projectile count and speed of common Splatguns

                        Compatibility code for Jakobs and Torgue E-Techs by Aaron0000 included below.

                        #<Code>

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion PhysicsMode PHYS_Projectile

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion UpwardVelocityBonus 0

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion GravityScaling 1

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_Hyperion SpeedFormula (BaseValueConstant=4200.000000)

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Barrel.SG_Barrel_Alien_Hyperion WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.200000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall PhysicsMode PHYS_Projectile

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall UpwardVelocityBonus 0

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall GravityScaling 1

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall SpeedFormula (BaseValueConstant=4200.000000)

                        #</Code>

                    #<Tediore Reload Behavior>

                        Alters Tediore Splatgun and Retcher reload behavior by lowering child grenade velocity and increasing the child grenades to three.

                        set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_TedioreReloadShotgun_Alien:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_SpawnProjectile_114 NumProjectilesFormula (BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_TedioreReload UpwardVelocityBonus 250.000000

                        set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Projectiles.Projectile_SplatBall_TedioreReload SpeedFormula (BaseValueConstant=250.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    #</Tediore Reload Behavior>

                    #<Retcher>

                        Eliminate Retcher gravity and increases projectile speed. Adds three projectiles (four to six (with Gentle prefix)). Increases status chance to bring it in line with other Splatguns.

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile PhysicsMode PHYS_Projectile

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile UpwardVelocityBonus 0

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile GravityScaling 1.000000

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile SpeedFormula (BaseValueConstant=3000.000000)

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_FireMode SoundDefinition FiringModeSoundDefinition'GD_Weap_Shotgun.FiringModes.SplatGunSoundDefinition'

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Projectile:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_8 MomentumFormula (BaseValueConstant=500.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shotgun.Spitter.Orchid_Seraph_Spitter_Barrel WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.800000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.200000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=7.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponReloadSpeed',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.350000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    #</Retcher>

                    #<Slow Hand>

                        Slightly redesigns the Slow Hand to be suitable for bleeding enemies to death with elemental damage. It now has two projectiles and doubled elemental damage to take advantage of its innate healing and high elemental chance.

                        set GD_Iris_Weapons.Shotguns.SG_Barrel_Alien_SlowHand WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.300000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    #</Slow Hand>

                #</Better Splatguns 1.4a>

                #<Dahl Brand Tweaks 1.2>

                    Standardizes Dahl burst count among common weapons to reduce part dependency and buffs underperforming gun types.

                    Coded by: Orudeon

                    Changelog:

                    V1.2

                    Added the Torrent (coded by AngrierPat)

                    V1.1

                    Added Scorpio (Thank you to AngrierPat)

                    #<Pistols>

                        Normalizes common Dahl Pistols to 3-shot bursts.

                        #<Burst Count>

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.A_Weapons.WeaponType_Dahl_Pistol ZoomWeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAutomaticBurstCount',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Dahl_Hornet ZoomWeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAutomaticBurstCount',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Hyperion_GwensHead ZoomWeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponPerShotAccuracyImpulse',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=10.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAutomaticBurstCount',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Dahl ZoomWeaponAttributeEffects ()

                        #</Burst Count>

                    #</Pistols>

                    #<Assault Rifles>

                        Normalizes common and E-Tech assault rifles to five-shot burst and removes Dahl E-Tech unique firing mode. All assault rifles are now more accurate for longer and can burst slightly sooner.

                        #<Buffs>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.A_Weapons.WT_Dahl_AssaultRifle BurstInterval 0.4

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.A_Weapons.WT_Dahl_AssaultRifle PerShotAccuracyImpulse 2.100000

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.A_Weapons.WT_Dahl_AssaultRifle Spread 1.7

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.A_Weapons.WT_Dahl_AssaultRifle FireRate 0.14

                        #</Buffs>

                        #<Burst Count>

                    #</Common Shotguns>

                #</Hyperion Brand Tweaks 1.1>

                #<Jakobs Brand Tweaks 1.2d>

                    Improves competitiveness of several Jakobs guns. Gives assault rifles full-auto. Hammerlock guns now sport perfect accuracy, high crit bonuses, and DPS similar to a full Jakobs Muckamuck to give them a unified Sniper theme.

                    Coded by Orudeon

                    Changelog:

                    V1.2d

                    Full Auto assault rifles now disabled by default. Lowered Striker damage by 3.3%.

                    V1.2c

                    Added compatibility code for Prefix Rework's wild accessory. Configure normally.

                    V1.2:

                    Lowered the Rex's crit rate and increased its base damage.

                    Doubled the Elephant Gun's crit damage (260% additive).

                    Doubled the Damned Cowboy's crit damage (200% additive and 30% multiplicative).

                    Added the Triquetra (firing pattern by AngrierPat).

                    V1.1

                    Simplified Striker code and enabled Vertical Grip again. It does not gain bonus projectiles from the Vertical Grip, only its other benefits. Slightly reduced the Striker's accuracy.

                    #<Pistols>

                        #<Rex>

                            Gives the Rex perfect accuracy, near-zero spread, and 500% additive crit. It maintains painfully slow fire rate, reload speed, and horrible body shot damage.

                            set GD_Sage_Weapons.Pistols.Pistol_Barrel_Jakobs_Rex ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCriticalHitBonus',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            set GD_Sage_Weapons.Pistols.Pistol_Barrel_Jakobs_Rex WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.900000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.800000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponReloadSpeed',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.600000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponPerShotAccuracyImpulse',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectileSpeedMultiplier',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.200000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.00000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        #</Rex>

                        #<Maggie>

                            Dramatically improves the Maggie's recoil.

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Jakobs_Maggie WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-1.800000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.500000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.500000)))

                        #</Maggie>

                    #</Pistols>

                    #<Assault Rifles>

                        All Jakobs assault rifles at baseline now fire 40% slower, but fire automatically. The Damned Cowboy is unaffected.

                        #<Full Auto>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.A_Weapons.WT_Jakobs_AssaultRifle FireRate 0.150000

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Accessory.AR_Accessory_BanditClamp_Wild WeaponAttributeEffects ()

                        #</Full Auto>

                    #<Shotguns>

                        #<Striker>

                            The Striker now deals roughly 35% less damage per pellet, fires thirteen pellets (Fandir? Thirteen.), but doesn't gain pellets from Vertical Grip anymore, and has significantly tighter spread to assist its functionality as a crit shotgun. Changes crit from additive to multiplicative (Due to how multiplicative crit displays, the card will now display 40% down from 72%; this is still a net buff).

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Barrel.SG_Barrel_Hyperion_Striker ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCriticalHitBonus',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                #<Laser Pistols 1.0>

                    Replaces Darts with Laser Pistols, which have 25% additive critical damage, pierce enemies, and bounce off surfaces once (twice if Hyperion).

                    Coded by: Orudeon

                    Features:

                    Dahl: Shotgun mode when ADS

                    Hyperion: Extra surface bounce. Also extra crit when combined with Gear Overhaul

                    Maliwan: High DoT chance and damage

                    Bandit: Extra shot chance when combined with Gear Overhaul

                    Vladof: It fires fast I guess

                    Tediore: Regenerates ammo when combined with Gear overhaul

                    set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Title.Title_Dart PartName Laser Pistol

                    set GD_Weap_Pistol.Name.Title.Title_Dart WeaponCardAttributes ((Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCriticalHitBonus',PriorityIncrease=0.50000))

                    set WeaponPartDefinition'GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Alien_Homing' CustomFiringModeDefinition FiringModeDefinition'GD_Weap_SniperRifles.FiringModes.Bullet_RailGun'

                    set WeaponPartDefinition'GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Alien_Homing' WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=2.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.200000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.800000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Maliwan',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Maliwan',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.200000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Maliwan',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=4.0000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAdditionalRicochets',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseVa                 #<Maliwan Brand Tweaks 1.1>

                    All Maliwan products excluding Sniper Rifles receive quality of life changes or in the case of rocket launchers, a substantial redesign.

                    Coded by Orudeon. It is highly recommended you use LightChaosman's Filter Tool to install this.

                    NOTE: This mod is incompatible with other mods that alter Rocket Launcher barrels. Please read instructions carefully.

                    Changelog:

                    V1.0a:

                    Improved Maliwan pistol fire rate and clip size.

                    #<Pistols>

                        Improves elemental effect damage by 33%, element chance by a small amount, and increases splash damage to 100%, up from 80%. Improves fire rate and clip size slightly. The Infection and Thunderball Fists do not receive splash buff. Wanderlust and other E-Techs only receive DoT buff.

                        set GD_Weap_Pistol.A_Weapons.WeaponType_Maliwan_Pistol FireRate 0.3333

                        set GD_Weap_Pistol.A_Weapons.WeaponType_Maliwan_Pistol ClipSize 8

                        set GD_Weap_Pistol.A_Weapons.WeaponType_Maliwan_Pistol WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.560000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.450000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Weap_Pistol.FiringModes.Bullet_Pistol_Maliwan:Behavior_Explode_5 DamageFormula (BaseValueScaleConstant=1.00000)

                    #</Pistols>

                    #<Rocket Launchers>

                        Redesigns Maliwan rocket launchers to deal significantly increased elemental damage with heavily increased elemental chance, while dealing significantly less direct damage. Detonation radius increased by 25%. Maliwan rocket launchers can now paint targets in a sizeable area for eventual death from elemental effects or nearly guaranteed slagging.

                        NOTE: These buffs are attached to barrels to avoid buffing PBFGs, which retain their functionality. Mods that alter these parts will conflict with this change.

                        #<Radius>

                            set GD_Weap_Launchers.Projectiles.Projectile_Rocket_Maliwan:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_2 DamageRadiusFormula (BaseValueConstant=250.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)
