                #</Vladof Brand Tweaks 1.1>

                #<Tediore Brand Overhaul 1.3c>

                    #<Description>

                        All Tediore weapons have received a redesign and combat tweaks. In addition to improving general combat usage of all four weapon types, all Tediore products (including grenades and rocket launchers) now innately have ammo regeneration that scales with rarity thanks to Tediore's digistruct technology. (Thank you to Aaron0000 for permission to incorporate Tediore REGENdaries.)

                        Coded by: Orudeon

                        Designed by: Orudeon, Zububu, AngrierPat, the_Nocturni, et al.

                        This version of Tediore Brand Overhaul does not require compatibility code for Better Splatguns.

                        Changelog:

                        v1.3c

                        Disables the Bunny's self-damage.

                        v1.3b

                        Give Tediore pistol barrels a 5% damage and 15% reload speed brand match buff.

                        v1.2b

                        Added optional Element Fix code for Rocket Launchers.

                        Increased child grenades and lowered child grenade velocity of Splatgun reload behavior.

                        v1.2

                        Converted Rocket Launcher code to a simpler version that only buffs Type. E-Tech barrel has a counter-nerf attached to keep relative damage the same.

                        Buffed Bunny damage on OP8 by approximately 28%.

                        Buffed Purple damage on OP8 by approximately 2.3%.

                        Buffed E-tech launcher damage on OP8 by approximately 0.87%.

                        v1.1a

                        Shotgun bonus baseline pellet reverted. Tediore shotgun barrel brand match bonus unchanged.

                        v1.1

                        Reduced Tediore reload buff formula from 1.85 to 1.70

                        Reduced SMG ammo regeneration to make it a more compelling resource.

                        Reduced Shotgun ammo regeneration to make it a more compelling resource.

                    #</Description>

                    #<TedioreReloadBuff>

                        #<Description>

                            Buffs the on-reload damage explosion of all Tediore weapons. In general, Tediore weapons are now more worth chucking unless you can regularly get critical hits. This boost is roughly 1.55x more damage (there's an element of random variance involved that makes an exact increase impossible to pin down). (Thank you to AngrierPat for nailing down this formula's workings.)

                            Changelog:

                            v1.1: Reduced from 1.85 to 1.70

                        #</Description>

                        #<Buffs>

                            set gd_balance_healthanddamage.healthanddamage.init_tediorereloaddamage valueformula (bEnabled=True,Multiplier=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponBulletsRemainingInClip',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.00000),Level=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Balance_HealthAndDamage.HealthAndDamage.Init_TedioreReloadDamage:AttributeDefinition_8',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.7000000),Power=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),Offset=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                        #</Buffs>

                    #</TedioreReloadBuff>

                    #<SMGs>

                        Slightly buffs base damage of Tediore SMGs at the Type-level and buffs sustained fire accuracy. Reduces the Baby Maker's Weapon Damage multiplier to counter the increased damage from reloading.

                        Changelog:

                        V1.1: Reduced SMG ammo regeneration.

                        #<Buffs>

                            set GD_Weap_SMG.A_Weapons.WT_SMG_Tediore PerShotAccuracyImpulse 1.7

                            set GD_Weap_SMG.A_Weapons.WT_SMG_Tediore InstantHitDamage (BaseValueConstant=20.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance_HealthAndDamage.HealthAndDamage.Init_WeaponDamage',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.880000)

                        #</Buffs>

                        #<Nerfs>

                            set GD_Weap_SMG.Barrel.SMG_Barrel_Tediore_BabyMaker WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Tediore',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.150000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponReloadSpeed',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Tediore',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.250000)))

                        #</Nerfs>

                        #<SMGsRegen>

                            Grant all Tediore SMGs baseline ammo regeneration. (Thank you to Aaron0000 for permission to adapt his code.)

                            #<White>

                                set GD_Weap_SMG.ManufacturerMaterials.Mat_Tedior_1 ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Patrol_SMG.Ammo_Patrol_SMG_RegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.50000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                            #</White>

                            #<GreenRegen>

                            This code changes Tediore rocket launcher reload explosions to inherit the element of the parent weapon. This code defaults to OFF in case your build depends on explosive reload.

                            #</GemstoneRegen>

                            #<ItemCardDescription>

                                set GD_Weap_Pistol.A_Weapons.WeaponType_Tediore_Pistol:AttributePresentationDefinition_2 NoConstraintText Explodes like a [skill]grenade[-skill] when [skill]reloaded[-skill] and slowly [skill]regenerates ammo[-skill].

                            #</ItemCardDescription>

                        #</Pistol Regen>

                    #</Pistols>

                    #<Grenades>

                        Tediore grenades now replenish over time, starting at one every twenty seconds for whites, going all the way to one every ten seconds for purples. Tediore regrets to inform you the Fastball is incompatible with this technology.

                        Due to lack of custom presentation attached to Tediore-brand grenades, the regeneration effect cannot be displayed without breaking something else in the game to usurp presentation data.

                        #<WhiteRegen>

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.05,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                        #</WhiteRegen>

                        #<GreenRegen>

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior_2_Uncommon ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.0625,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                        #</GreenRegen>

                        #<BlueRegen>

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior_3_Rare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.0769231,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                        #</BlueRegen>

                        #<PurpleRegen>

                            set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior_4_VeryRare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.1,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                        #</PurpleRegen>

                    #</Grenades>

                #</Tediore Brand Overhaul 1.3c>

                #<Torgue Brand Tweaks 1.0>

                    Alters Torgue weapons to improve quality of life issues.

                    #<Projectiles>

                        #<Speed>

                            Doubles projectile speed of all common Torgue guns.

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.FiringModes.Bullets_Pistol_Torgue_GyroJet Speed 1600

                            set GD_Weap_Shotgun.FiringModes.Bullets_Shotgun_Torgue_GyroJet Speed 1200

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.FiringModes.Bullets_Assault_Torgue_GyroJet Speed 2000

                        #</Speed>

                        #<Pistols>

                            Increases explosion radius by 50%.

                            set GD_Weap_Pistol.FiringModes.Bullets_Pistol_Torgue_GyroJet:Behavior_Explode_5 DamageRadiusFormula (BaseValueConstant=90.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.250000)

                        #</Pistols>

                    #</Projectiles>

                    #<SWORDSPLOSION!!!>

                        Gives the SWORDSPLOSION!!! three projectiles irrespective of accessory.

                        set GD_Aster_Weapons.Shotguns.SG_Barrel_Alien_Swordsplosion WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-9999.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    #</SWORDSPLOSION!!!>

                    #<Pocket Rocket>

                        Removes the Pocket Rocket's shot cost increase.

                        set GD_Iris_Weapons.Pistols.Pistol_Barrel_Torgue_PocketRocket WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=6.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Torgue',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.050000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.800000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    #</Pocket Rocket>

                    #<12 Pounder>

                        Gives the 12 Pounder two additional rockets in its magazine.

                        set GD_Orchid_BossWeapons.Launcher.L_Barrel_Torgue_12Pounder WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    #</12 Pounder>

                    #<Assault Rifle Damage Type><MUT>

                        Alters all Torgue-barreled Assault Rifles to offer a choice of splash damage type. Defaults to Grenade.

                        #<Rocket (Vanilla)>

                            #set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Rocket_Torgue:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_1 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                            #set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Dahl_Grenade:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_11 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                            #set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Jakobs_Cannonball:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_0 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Rocket'<off>

                        #</Rocket (Vanilla)>

                        #<Grenade>

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Rocket_Bandit:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_53 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Rocket_Torgue:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_1 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Dahl_Grenade:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_11 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Jakobs_Cannonball:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_0 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'

                            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Projectiles.Projectile_Rocket_Vladof:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_Explode_9 DamageSource Class'Willow.WillowDmgSource_Grenade'

                        #</Grenade>

                    #</Assault Rifle Damage Type>

                #</Torgue Brand Tweaks 1.0>

                #<Relic Overhaul 1.05>

                    Redesigns most relics in the game to increase competitiveness and variability.

                    Warning: Contains some presentation code that may alter how your existing relics or class mods display.

                    Coded by: Orudeon, with assistance from LightChaosman, Mike/Soze, Jim Raven, Aaron0000,

                    Dependencies coded by SirUmnei, used/altered with permission.

                    Thank you to Mike for doing Relic appearances and fixing so many UI errors I don't know how to count them all.

                    Please check Optional Modules and enable only one subfolder.

                    Changelog:

                    V1.05

                    Buffed all Heart of the Ancients variants to 79% damage.

                    Buffed all Aggression relics to 91% damage.

                    #<List Of Features>

                        Massively buffs the statistics of Aggression relics to allow them to compete with similar relics.

                        Dramatically increased the potency of Proficiency relics to compete with Bones of the Ancients.

                        Redesigns the Might of the Seraphs to increase reload speed and fire rate with all weapons. Also increases movement speed. Requires UCP.

                        Stockpile relics now add an absolute value of ammo, increasing usefulness at all points of gameplay. Additionally, all Stockpile relics now provide an enormous upgrade over Blood of the Ancients' ammo pools.

                        Blood of the Ancients now add an absolute value of ammo. Additionally, all now provide more ammo than you could have gotten with a max quality percent-based one for a net upgrade to all ammo pools.

                        Note: To get the final 'even' numbers, fractional bullets are granted at some upgrade levels. Your stockpile relic or Blood of the Ancients may grant unusual numbers below maximum quality.

                        AngrierPat redesigned the Friendship Amulet to grant all team members (including yourself) +10% damage, maximum and minimum accuracy, weapon spread, reload speed, and magazine size, stacking with itself up to +40% to all stats.

                        Increases the effectiveness of Elemental relics to allow them to compete with Bones of the Ancients.

                        Changes Allegiance relics so blue and purple Allegiance relics often have all three attributes instead of two randomly selected ones.

                        WARNING: Violates Sanity check. Probably deletes all existing Allegiance relics. Do not load affected save files without activating this mod first. Check included Gibbed codes.

                        Increases the effectiveness of Protection relics to 71% shield capacity/recharge rate and adds 44.5% recharge delay at maximum quality to compete with Skin of the Ancients.

                        Resistance relics now spawn with standardized resistance percents, now also grants resistance to dot elemental damage, and reduces your chance to be affected by dots (in addition to resisting impact damage).

                        The Bone of the Ancients now comes in Explosive, Slag, and Melee/Melee Override Cooldown. Framework coded by SirUmnei and used/altered with permission.

                        WARNING: Violates Sanity check. Deletes all existing Bones of the Ancients. Do not load affected save files without activating this mod first. Check included Gibbed codes.

                        Skin of the Ancients now spawns with standardized resistance percents, now also grants resistance to dot elemental damage and reduces your chance to be affected by dots (in addition to resisting impact damage) and now always spawns with all three shield stats.

                        WARNING: Violates Sanity check. Probably deletes all existing Skins of the Ancients. Do not load affected save files without activating this mod first.

                        To adjust existing Skins of the Ancients, use Gibbed to change the BetaPart to Effect7. No other parts may have Effect7.

                        Redesigns the Blood of the Seraphs to subtract a large portion of health in exchange for a very large chunk of constantly active health regeneration. Thank you to AngrierPat for the idea.

                        Tenacity, Vitality, and Heart of the Ancients relics have optional vanilla-style changes or Aaron0000's Agility Relic designs incorporated.

                    #</List Of Features>

                    #<Dependencies (Do not deactivate to preserve core functionality)>

                        #<Theta>

                            set GD_Artifacts.Upgrade.Upgrade_Grade0 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Effect1",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect1_2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect1_3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect1_4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect2_2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect2_3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect2_4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect3_2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect3_3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect3_4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect4_2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect4_3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect4_4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect5",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect5_2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect5_3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect5_4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect6",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect6_2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect6_3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect6_4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect7",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect7_2",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect7_3",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Effect7_4",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False))

                    #<Optional Modules><MUT>

                        #<Aaron's Agility Relics>

                            #<Agility Relics>

                                Replaces Tenacity relics with Agility relics, which increase your movement speed and jump height. Also adjusts Heart of the Ancients relics to boost speed and jump height as well.

                                Coded by: Aaron, used/altered with permission.

                                Jump Attribute created by Nocturni, UI Fixes created by SirUmnei

                        #</Vanilla Relics>

                    #</Optional Modules>

                #</Relic Overhaul 1.05>

                #<Shield Stat Tweaks>

                    #<Description>

                        Tweaks shield parts to bring the average quality of randomly generated shields up. In designing this mod, several core tenets were adhered to...

                        1) Don't nerf excellent attributes.

                        2) Buff terrible attributes to a minimum.

                        3) Buff underutilized brands so every brand has something going for it.

                        In general, if an attribute was increased, it may have been increased a lot. If an attribute was decreased, it probably wasn't decreased by much. Excellent brands were already very close to the target 'quality'. Overall, shields should offer a little bit more tankiness and special effects should be stronger.

                        By Orudeon, with assistance from SirUmnei, Zububu, AngrierPat, et al.

                        Please note that you must pick a Torgue capacitor in the Torgue section or this mod will default to the UCP version.

                        Due to an as of yet unfixable bug, the Cracked Sash's inventory presentation is broken by this mod. This makes it impossible to determine its recharge rate and delay without guesswork. Its HUD capacity displays correctly.

                        V1.2:

                        - Added compatibility for the UCP's Torgue capacitor buff.

                        V1.1:

                        - Fixed elemental immunity capacitors incorrectly not granting immunity/resistance.

                    #</Description>

                    #<Tediore>

                        Tediore parts offer bonuses to rate and delay while suffering in capacity with middling special bonuses. Nerfed Tediore part recharge delay very slightly.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body1_Tediore ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body1_Tediore AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery1_Tediore ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery1_Tediore AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor1_Tediore ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor1_Tediore AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=False))

                    #</Tediore>

                    #<Bandit>

                        Bandit parts offer the greatest recharge rate among all shield parts; this is unchanged. However, it suffered an enormous penalty to special. Special buffed slightly while Delay nerfed slightly to make up for this power boost.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body2_Bandit ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor2_Bandit ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor2_Bandit AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=1,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=-1,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False))

                    #</Bandit>

                    #<Vladof>

                        Vladof parts offer almost nothing. They have a slight detriment to capacity and delay, while offering a slight boost to recharge rate.

                        Buffed capacity slightly, recharge rate slightly, but nerfed delay slightly to compensate. Vladof now boasts second best recharge rate of any brand, beating out tediore slightly.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body3_Vladof ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    #</Vladof>

                    #<Dahl>

                        Dahl parts offer the second best recharge delay of any shield manufacturer, but at a slight penalty to capacity, rate, and special.

                        Buffed capacity, but slightly nerfed rate to compensate.

                    #</Dahl>

                    #<Anshin>

                        Anshin parts offer excellent capacity at the expense of horrible recharge rate (beating Pangolin for worst) and horrendous delay (almost beating Pangolin). While it offered a slight increase to special, this did not make up for the enormous loss otherwise.

                        Anshin has received the second largest change, with an enormous buff to delay to bring it to the middle of the pack, and a hefty buff to recharge rate to make it compete with other brands a bit better. Anshin now offers superb capacity at a detriment to recharge rate.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body5_Anshin ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body5_Anshin AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=-3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery5_Anshin ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery5_Anshin AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=-3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor5_Anshin ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor5_Anshin AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=-3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=False))

                    #</Anshin>

                    #<Maliwan>

                        Maliwan parts offer the highest Special stat of any brand, but at the expense of capacity. It slightly increased recharge rate, but not by much. Its purpose as a shield part has not been altered by this mod.

                        Nerfed recharge rate slightly and buffed capacity slightly. Its elemental immunity capabilities have not been altered.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body5_Maliwan ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body5_Maliwan AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery5_Maliwan ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery5_Maliwan AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor5_Maliwan_CorrosiveRes ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor5_Maliwan_CorrosiveRes AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="CorrosiveResist",GradeIncrease=0,bActivateSlot=True))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor5_Maliwan_FireRes ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        #Thanks to Mike/Soze for this typo correction.

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor5_Maliwan_ShockRes:AttributePresentationDefinition_2 Description [shock]Grants immunity to Electrocute damage.[-shock]

                    #</Maliwan>

                    #<Torgue>

                        Torgue parts were another brand that in general made your shield worse if you didn't specifically want the explosive-resistant capacitor. It offered slight benefits to capacity and recharge rate, while having a huge penalty to special and a minor penalty to delay.

                        Slightly buffed all four stats. Overall, Torgue should fall in line with its "guns for real men" motto a bit more, at least with respect to their shields. The explosive-resistant capabilities have not been altered.

                        new to V1.2 is an optional component that lets you continue to use the UCP's Torgue capacitor buff or this capacitor stat.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body6_Torgue ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body6_Torgue AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=-1,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery6_Torgue ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery6_Torgue AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=5,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=-1,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False))

                        #<Capacitor><MUT>

                            #<Shield Stat Tweaks Version>

                                set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor6_Torgue_ExplosiveRes ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        #</Capacitor>

                    #</Torgue>

                    #<Hyperion>

                        Hyperion parts boast the best recharge delay of any shield manufacturer and the second best special rating (though not by much, Maliwan reigns supreme). However, this comes at a penalty to capacity and a slight penalty to recharge rate. This design paradigm hasn't changed for this mod, however to bring it in line with other shield parts, its recharge rate has been nerfed, by as little as possible that is.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body7_Hyperion ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body7_Hyperion AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=-3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery7_Hyperion ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    #</Hyperion>

                    #<Pangolin>

                        Pangolin parts offered the best capacity out of any brand, at the detriment to every other stat. Boasting the worst recharge rate (second only to Anshin) and the worst delay (beating Ashin) with a detrimental Special stat, Pangolin objectively made your shield worse.

                        Pangolin still maintains excellent capacity, but its recharge rate and delay have been buffed. While still objectively the worst, they are by no means as severe. Additionally, Pangolin now has a superb Special stat, beating out Hyperion very slightly. This should increase the variation of special-dependent shields by a significant degree.

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body8_Pangolin ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Body.Body8_Pangolin AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery8_Pangolin ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Battery.Battery8_Pangolin AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor8_Pangolin ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldCapacitySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeRateSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldRechargeDelaySlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ShieldSpecialSlotGradeMinusRarity',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Shields.Capacitor.Capacitor8_Pangolin AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Capacity",GradeIncrease=8,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeRate",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="RechargeDelay",GradeIncrease=-4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special01",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False),(SlotName="Special02",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False))

                    #</Pangolin>

                #</Shield Stat Tweaks>

                #<Shield Behavior Overhaul 1.2a>

                    Buffs most shield types (sometimes majorly) to improve overall usability and help specialized or common shields compete with generalized and unique-or-better ones. This mod is designed to be used with Shield Stat Tweaks and requires the Unofficial Community Patch v3.1 or better for Amp shield functionality.

                    Coded by: Orudeon, with major help from LightChaosman (coded the Amp Shield behavior), AngrierPat (coded the Absorb shield data), zububu, et al. It is highly recommended you use LightChaosman's Filter Tool to install this.

                    Changelog:

                    V1.2a

                    No Delay Amp shields recharge rate lowered to 65% of normal rate (down from 70%). Now defaults to Standard Delay configuration.

                    V1.2

                    Give Booster shields additional functionality. They now have a one seventh chance to drop health or ammo and always drop two items.

                    Add a workaround for No Delay amp shields. Use if you have drain-related issues, such as only draininng on the first shot.

                    V1.1

                    Vladof (Absorb) Shields tweaked

                    #<Amp Shields>

                        Redesigns common Amp Shields to constantly regenerate, apply Amp and drain every shot insofar as there's enough shield to drain, and triples common Amp shield Amp damage to help them better compete with The Bee. Please thank LightChaosman for coding the Amp/Drain on every shot behavior.

                        If you'd prefer regular delay values, you can optionally enable that instead. This code defaults to No Delay if not configured.

                        Required Code:

                        set GD_Shields.Skills.Impact_Shield_Skill:AttributeExpressionEvaluator_20 Expression (AttributeOperand1=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.ShieldResourcePool.ShieldCurrentValue',ComparisonOperator=OPERATOR_GreaterThanOrEqual,Operand2Usage=OPERAND_PreferAttribute,AttributeOperand2=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Shield.ImpactShield_ConsumptionOnEmpower',ConstantOperand2=0.000000)

                        #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ampshieldContinuousDrain1"</key><value>",GD_Shields.Skills.Impact_Shield_Skill:BehaviorProviderDefinition_0,BehaviorSequences[0].ConsolidatedLinkedVariables,,(0,0,1,0,2,1,0,1,1,0,0)"</value><on>

                        set GD_Shields.A_Item.Shield_Impact:AttributePresentationDefinition_0 Description Weapon shots deal bonus [skill]Amp Damage[-skill].

                        #<Delay Format><MUT>

                            #<Normal Delay>

                    #</Amp Shields>

                    #<Booster Shields>

                        Shield Boosters now automatically pick up, giving you a periodic 'boost' to shield capacity with minimal interaction from the user, however their shield restore value is now 20% of capacity to balance this. Big Boom Blaster boosters are automatically picked up, but Whiskey Tango Foxtrot's are not, however it now drops more boosters to increase its offensive capability.

                        Additionally, common Booster shields have a 10% higher chance of dropping boosters.

                        Common booster shields have a one seventh chance to drop health or ammo and now drop two items on proc. Coded by AngrierPat for this mod.

                        Pickup and boost amount data coded by the_Nocturni and used with permission.

                        #<Code>

                            set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Misc.Iris_Seraph_ShieldBooster_Pickup bAutomaticallyPickup True

                            set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Misc.Iris_Seraph_ShieldBooster_Pickup bAIUseItemOnPickup True

                            set GD_HealthDrops.A_Item.ShieldBooster_Pickup bAutomaticallyPickup True

                            set GD_HealthDrops.A_Item.ShieldBooster_Pickup bAIUseItemOnPickup True

                            set GD_Shields.Pickups.ShieldBooster_Pickup_legendary bAIUseItemOnPickup True

                            set GD_AttributePresentation.Echo.AttrPresent_Att_DummyShieldBooster Description Instantly recharges shields by 12.5%

                            set GD_HealthDrops.Skills.BoosterShieldPickup_Skill InitialDuration 0.400000

                            set GD_Shields.Itempools.LegendaryBoosterShieldItemPool Quantity (BaseValueConstant=2.000000)

                    #<Novas>

                        #<Deadly Bloom>

                            Redesign the Deadly Bloom to have lower capacity, but better rate, delay, and nova damage.

                    #</Novas>

                    #<Spike Shields>

                        Increases the damage and recharge rate of Spike shields, reduces recharge delay, and grants them 50% melee resistance to fulfill their intended use easier. Explosive Spike shields inherit a larger portion of damage due to being incapable of element-matching.

                        #<Impaler improvement>

                    #<Absorb Shields>

                        Tweaks absorb shields to have a much higher absorb chance at the expense of taking 20% of damage from absorbed shots instead of no damage. The Sponge and Sham continue to absorb 100% of damage with unchanged absorb chances.

                #<Seraphs Sell for Crystals>

                    Changes Seraph shields, relics, and grenades to sell to any vendor for one third their categorical buying price (40 for shields and grenades, 20 for relics). This mod cannot affect weapons due to how weapon price data is coded.

                    Coded by Mike for Gear Overhaul

                    #<Shields>

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Sponge.Iris_Seraph_Shield_Sponge FormOfCurrency CURRENCY_SeraphCrystals

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Sponge.Iris_Seraph_Shield_Sponge MonetaryValue (BaseValueConstant=40.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Aster_Shields.A_Item.Aster_Seraph_Antagonist_Shield FormOfCurrency CURRENCY_SeraphCrystals

                        set GD_Aster_Shields.A_Item.Aster_Seraph_Antagonist_Shield MonetaryValue (BaseValueConstant=40.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Aster_Shields.A_Item.Aster_Seraph_Blockade_Shield FormOfCurrency CURRENCY_SeraphCrystals

                        set GD_Aster_Shields.A_Item.Aster_Seraph_Blockade_Shield MonetaryValue (BaseValueConstant=40.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shield.Anshin.Orchid_Seraph_Anshin_Shield FormOfCurrency CURRENCY_SeraphCrystals

                        set GD_Orchid_RaidWeapons.Shield.Anshin.Orchid_Seraph_Anshin_Shield MonetaryValue (BaseValueConstant=40.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Hoplite.Iris_Seraph_Shield_Juggernaut FormOfCurrency CURRENCY_SeraphCrystals

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Hoplite.Iris_Seraph_Shield_Juggernaut MonetaryValue (BaseValueConstant=40.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Pun-chee.Iris_Seraph_Shield_Pun-chee FormOfCurrency CURRENCY_SeraphCrystals

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.Pun-chee.Iris_Seraph_Shield_Pun-chee MonetaryValue (BaseValueConstant=40.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.BigBoomBlaster.Iris_Seraph_Shield_Booster FormOfCurrency CURRENCY_SeraphCrystals

                #<Gemstone Loot Pools>

                    Equalizes Gemstone weapon type probabilities so Pistols are not overwhelmingly more common than others. Also adds a chance for Tiny Tina dice roll chests to contain a gemstone weapon.

                    Simplifies (I hope) dice roll chest loot pools to involve less math (this may result in unintended side effects due to how complicated dice roll chests' loot pool is).

                    Coded by Orudeon

                    set ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Aster_ItemPools.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_04_Gemstone' BalancedItems ((ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Aster_ItemPools.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_Pistols_04_Gemstone',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance.Weighting.Weight_2_Uncommon',BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Aster_ItemPools.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_Shotguns_04_Gemstone',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance.Weighting.Weight_2_Uncommon',BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Aster_ItemPools.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_SMGs_04_Gemstone',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance.Weighting.Weight_2_Uncommon',BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Aster_ItemPools.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_ARs_04_Gemstone',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance.Weighting.Weight_2_Uncommon',BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Aster_ItemPools.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_Snipers_04_Gemstone',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance.Weighting.Weight_2_Uncommon',BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),bDropOnDeath=True))

            #</mods>

        #</Gear Overhaul 1.25>

        #<Krieg_v3>

            Mod by B33P B00P JOE

            *************

            This overhaul is meant to take skills that were often either overlooked or outright "bad" with Krieg

            and spice them up, or give them at least some well earned polish!

            Included are the community patch buffs to Krieg as of 3.1

            As well as a collection of fixes by TheNocturni and Soze atop my own input.

            They have a few other things for Krieg on their GitHubs that I did not include, but feel free to add them to the pack!

            *************

            #<Change List>

                *************

                Changelist:

                *************

                Blood Euphoria Added [UCP]

                Raving Retribution Rants [UCP]

                Salt the Wound Icon Stacking Fix [UCP]

                Silence the Voices made to not be Grenade Damage [UCP]

                Silence the Voices visual clarity [Soze]

                Blood Twitch Passive instead of Kill Skill [Nocturni]

                Flame Flare Burn Resistance [Nocturni]

                Kill Skill Slots Fix [Nocturni]

                *************

                -----------------------------

                Bloody Revival:

                -----------------------------

                - Damage per stack 1.5 --> 1.0

                + Affects Gun, Melee and Grenade Damage in FFYL

                *************

                -----------------------------

                Pull the Pin:

                -----------------------------

                - Made Tier 2

                + Grenade Damage boost is now 15% from 10% in the UCP.

                *************

                -----------------------------

                Embrace the Pain:

                -----------------------------

                - Reduced max fire rate boost to 25%

                + Added 25% Elemental DoT resistance when active

                + Works during Buzz Axe Ramapage / FFYL

                *************

                -----------------------------

                Fuel the Rampage:

                -----------------------------

                - Friendly Fire removed

                + Replaced with 25% movement speed at 5/5

                + This movement speed also increases as you take Health Damage.

                + Movement speed applies in FFYL

                *************

                -----------------------------

                Light the Fuse:

                -----------------------------

                + Thrown Dynamite Sticks have increased damage and blast radius.

                + Affected by Bloody Revival

                + Does a bit more damage overall

                *************

                -----------------------------

                Thrill of the Kill:

                -----------------------------

                * Swapped places with Salt the Wound, is now a tier 4  skill while StW is a Tier 3.

                + Overkill healing is now 100% at 5/5

                + Works during FFYL, but at a -vastly- reduced rate

                + Works well combined with Light the Fuse as you can explode a ton of trash mobs for a revival boost.

                + Also increases Max HP by up to 35% at 5/5

                *************

                -----------------------------

                Hellfire Halitosis:

                -----------------------------

                + Damage and Range Doubled

                - Cooldown increased from 15 sec to 20 sec

                + Counts as Melee Damage

                *************

                _____________

                *************

                Includes TPS skills compatability for Krieg!

                *************

            #</Change List>

            #<Skill Changes>

                    #</TPS Skills>

                #</Full TPS Skills>

            #</Skill Swaps>

        #</Krieg_v3>

        #<Salvador_Overhaul_V3>

            #Mod by B33P B00P JOE<off>

            #*************<off>

            #This overhaul is meant to take Sal in a fresh, new direction in many areas.<off>

            #Focusing on alternative playstyles, as well as ironing out "questionable" attributes,<off>

            #the Salvadore_Overhaul offers many more skill synergies throughout each of the skill trees<off>

            #instead of mainly just Gun Lust and Rampage.<off>

            #Many underperforming skills have been brought up to par, including replacing<off>

            #"All I Need is One" with a new skill: "Hot Load".<off>

            #Each skill below has a description of changes, as well as design notes where applicable.<off>

            #*************<off>

            #New in Version 3:<off>

            #--------------------------------<off>

            #+ Gunzerking correctly rebalances damage for both guns<off>

            #*************<off>

            #*************<off>

            #New in Version 2:<off>

            #--------------------------------<off>

            #+ Gunzerking Description now shows base duration<off>

            #+ Rebalanced Inconceviable. Now properly scales for all weapons<off>

            #+ Get Some Crit Bonus 12% --> 15% max<off>

            #+ Fixed a bug that caused Fistful of Hurt to always cause lifesteal at all times<off>

            #+ Just Got Real now scales like Inconceivable used to. Shields AND/OR HP determine the bonus!<off>

            #+ Added compatability fixes for common Sal mods<off>

            #*************<off>

            #<Gunzerking Tweaks>

                #<Description>

                    #*************<off>

                    #Gunzerking Changes:<off>

                    #Damage Reduction: 0.5 --> 0.6<off>

                    #Ammo Regeneration: 3 --> 1.5<off>

                    #Weapon Swap Speed: 0% --> +50%<off>

                    #Weapon Damage: 0% --> -17.25% for each gun<off>

                    #Weapon Accuracy: 0% --> -25%<off>

                    #Melee Override Cooldown: 0% --> +100% (Halved)<off>

                    #___________________________________________<off>

                    #These changes are a starting point to branch out into different build possibilities.<off>

                    #In the trees, various skills were altered to grant increased perks that with vanilla gunzerking, may be a tad overwhelming.<off>

                    #Melee Override and Damage Reduction offer better melee / survival as a possible route<off>

                    #Swap Speed is a nice general boost and synergizes greatly with overlooked Gun Lust skills<off>

                    #The Ammo regen nerf is offset by the inclusion of Ammo Regen in skills that can be always on, and are even boostable.<off>

                    #The damage and accuracy tweaks are offset by the fact that he gains more damage boosts in his skills now, and there are hidden recoil buffs in Gunzerk already.<off>

                    #*************<off>

                #</Description>

                #<Hotfixes>

                #<Hot Load (All I Need is One)>

                    #<Description>

                        #*************<off>

                        #"Hot Load" (All I Need is One):<off>

                        #Completely reworked into a new skill = "Hot Load"<off>

                        #Swapping weapons "refreshes" them, granting a 5.5-second boost to damage. (Same duration as Locked and Loaded)<off>

                        #This damage bonus scales up to +55%, based on ammo currently in the magazine:<off>

                        #25/50 bullets = 22.5% damage boost, and so on.<off>

                        #Swapping weapons refreshes this bonus, and it synergizes well<off>

                        #with skills that reload fast, or keep you at high ammo.<off>

                        #_____________________________________________________________<off>

                        #As "All I Need is One" was extremely lackluster, creating a<off>

                        #new skill that has the same spirit seemed appropriate.<off>

                        #This now boasts great synergy with Auto Loader, Quick Draw,<off>

                        #and the new Inconceivable in particular.<off>

                        #*************<off>

                    #</Description>

                    #<Hotfixes>

                #<No Kill Like Overkill>

                    #<Description>

                        #*************<off>

                        #No Kill Like Overkill:<off>

                        #Duration: 10 sec --> 3 sec<off>

                        #Damage Scale: 100% --> 50%<off>

                        #Damage Type: MT_PostAdd --> MT_PreAdd (can receive damage bonuses from skills!)<off>

                        #Damage Scaling on kills has also been reversed where killing<off>

                        #big targets now grants a superior bonus vs killing small targets.<off>

                        #_________________________________________________________________<off>

                        #In the vanilla game, this skill arguably was what pushed Sal over the egde.<off>

                        #The change to a 3 second duration, as well as the flip on who you'd want to aim to kill first<off>

                        #adds a new layer of skill and strategy, while the change to PreAdd damage bonus allows you to<off>

                        #make the most of the very brief window!<off>

                        #*************<off>

                    #</Description>

                    #<Hotfixes>
