                #<Inconceivable>

                    #<Description>

                        #*************<off>

                        #Inconceivable:<off>

                        #Chance of free Shots: 50% max --> 25% max<off>

                        #Reworked to scale based on ammo in your magazine, instead of HP/Shield depletion.<off>

                        #More ammo = better chance to proc<off>

                        #______________________________________________________________<off>

                        #Makes reload skills extra valuable, as you can refresh your chances on demand.<off>

                        #This of course limits the ability to chain Money Shot, but opens the doors to different synergies.<off>

                        #An obvious example is with "Hot Load", where staying at a more full magazine allows for a better boost!<off>

                        #*************<off>

                    #</Description>

                    #<Hotfixes>

                        #<hotfix><key>"SparkOnDemandPatchEntry-Inconceivable3"</key><value>"GD_Mercenary_Streaming,GD_Mercenary_Skills.Misc.Att_Inconceivable_ConstraintCalc:ConditionalAttributeValueResolver_0,ValueExpressions,,(bEnabled=True,ConditionalExpressionList=((BaseValueIfTrue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),Expressions=((AttributeOperand1=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Combat_Shotgun.Ammo_Combat_Shotgun_RegenerationRate',ComparisonOperator=OPERATOR_LessThan,Operand2Usage=OPERAND_PreferAttribute,AttributeOperand2=None,ConstantOperand2=1.000000),(AttributeOperand1=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponBulletsRemainingInClip',ComparisonOperator=OPERATOR_LessThan,Operand2Usage=OPERAND_PreferAttribute,AttributeOperand2=None,ConstantOperand2=1.000000)))),DefaultBaseValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))"</value><off>

                #<FilledtotheBrim_AmmoRegen>

                    #<Description>

                        #*************<off>

                        #Changes Filled to the Brim to grant Ammo Regen by 0.1/pt for all ammo (0.005/pt for Rockets) instead of Ammo Capacity<off>

                        #________________________________________________________________<off>

                        #Essentially a side-grade, this has essentially the same effect over a period of time, and again can allow for<off>

                        #more build variety as this is boostable.<off>

                        #*************<off>

                    #</Description>

                #<JustGotReal>

                    #<Description>

                        #*************<off>

                        #Just Got Real:<off>

                        #Gun Damage: 40% max --> 30% Max<off>

                        #Melee Damage: 0% --> 30% Max<off>

                        #Now scales on % of missing Shields and HP.<off>

                        #_________________________________________________<off>

                        #Before, Just Got Real was counter intuitive as it scaled based on missing HP in<off>

                        #a tree that constantly healed you, and even then only reached max value in FFYL.<off>

                        #The addition of Melee damage is to offer up more variables for builds,<off>

                        #especially since this is boostable and can stack with roid shields!<off>

                        #*************<off>

                    #</Description>

        #<SkillSystemOverhaul>

            Made by Coleby

            Gain 2 Skill Points instead of 1 and increase some skills' maximum grade to 10

            NOTE: Salvador's Inconceivable, I'm the Juggernaut, Yippie Ki Yay, Gaige's Blood-Soaked Shields, Maya's Subsequence and Krieg's Numbed Nerves and Fuel the Rampage aren't included.

            SECOND NOTE: Gaige's Nth Degree is capped at 8, so every 2nd bullet ricochets. I tried to make every bullet ricochet, but the skill didn't work as expected.

            WARNING: Activate this mod before loading your character, because if you not activate this mod (by accident), you will lose your extra skill points (which can be recovered by using Cheat Engine)

            #<2 Skill Points per level>

                set GD_Globals.Skills.INI_SkillPointsPerLevelUp ConditionalInitialization (bEnabled=True,ConditionalExpressionList=((BaseValueIfTrue=(BaseValueConstant=2,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),Expressions=((AttributeOperand1=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.ExperienceResourcePool.PlayerExperienceLevel',ComparisonOperator=OPERATOR_GreaterThanOrEqual,Operand2Usage=OPERAND_PreferAttribute,AttributeOperand2=None,ConstantOperand2=1)))),DefaultBaseValue=(BaseValueConstant=0,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1))

            #</2 Skill Points per level>

            #<Axton>

                #<Guerrilla Tree>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkOnDemandPatchEntry-Guerilla Tree1"</key><value>"GD_Soldier_Streaming,GD_Soldier_Skills.Guerrilla.Sentry,MaxGrade,,10"</value><on>

        #</SkillSystemOverhaul>

        #<SlagOverhaul>

            #<Description>

                Mod by B33P B00P JOE

                ***WARNING***

                This overhauls the Slag Element completely.

                Load this as early as you can!

                *************

                Based on the amazing Cryo Mod by Aaron0000, Kazy, Mike, FromDarkHell, and The Campin' Dutchman.

                Turns Slag into something less polarizing, a bit of a hybrid of Slag and Cryo!

                Changes from Vanilla Slag:

                +75% movement slowdown when slagged.

                Reduces fire rate by 37.5% when slagged.

                +125% melee / critical damage.

                +75% non-slag bonus damage.

                +50% slag on slag damage.

                Added Damage over time.

                8 second base duration, like Death Mark

                Slag is naturally weak vs shields, dealing less damage / DoT and having a lesser application chance

            #</Description>

            #<Code>

                #<Element Status Effects (Slag Bonus Damage Modifiers)>

                    set GD_Amp.Skills.Skill_AmplifyDamage SkillEffectDefinitions ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.DamageSourceModifiers.ReceivedAmplifyDamageModifier',bIncludeDuelingTargets=False,bIncludeSelfAsTarget=False,bOnlyEffectTargetsInRange=False,bExcludeNonPlayerCharacters=False,EffectTarget=TARGET_Self,TargetInstanceDataName=,TargetCriteria=CRITERIA_None,ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Amp.Skills.Init_AmplifyDamageScale',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.750000),GradeToStartApplyingEffect=1,PerGradeUpgradeInterval=1,PerGradeUpgrade=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),BonusUpgradeList=),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.DamageTypeModifers.AmpImpactDamageModifier',bIncludeDuelingTargets=False,bIncludeSelfAsTarget=False,bOnlyEffectTargetsInRange=False,bExcludeNonPlayerCharacters=False,EffectTarget=TARGET_Self,TargetInstanceDataName=,TargetCriteria=CRITERIA_None,ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Amp.Skills.Init_AmplifyDamageScale',BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.150000),GradeToStartApplyingEffect=1,PerGradeUpgradeInterval=1,PerGradeUpgrade=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),BonusUpgradeList=),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.FootSpeed',bIncludeDuelingTargets=False,bIncludeSelfAsTarget=False,bOnlyEffectTargetsInRange=False,bExcludeNonPlayerCharacters=True,EffectTarget=TARGET_Self,TargetInstanceDataName=,TargetCriteria=CRITERIA_None,ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.750000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),GradeToStartApplyingEffect=0,PerGradeUpgradeInterval=1,PerGradeUpgrade=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseV                     set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Impact:AttributePresentationDefinition_1 Description [slag]Slagged enemies are slowed and take additional damage from all sources.[-slag]

                #</Element Status Effects (Slag Bonus Damage Modifiers)>

                #<Damage (Damage that Slag Deals directly)>

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Impact FleshDamageModifier (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance_HealthAndDamage.DamageMultipliers.Init_NormalElementResistMultiplier_ByPlaythrough',BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Impact ShieldDamageModifier (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance_HealthAndDamage.DamageMultipliers.Init_HighElementResistMultiplier_ByPlaythrough',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.750000)

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Impact bNoBlood True

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Impact MaxDamageRadius 0.100000

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Impact MinDamagePercent 0.750000

                #</Damage (Damage that Slag Deals directly)>

                #<Status Damage (Slag DoT damage)>

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Status FleshDamageModifier (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance_HealthAndDamage.DamageMultipliers.Init_NormalElementResistMultiplier_ByPlaythrough',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.500000)

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Status ShieldDamageModifier (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance_HealthAndDamage.DamageMultipliers.Init_HighElementResistMultiplier_ByPlaythrough',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.500000)

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Status bNoPlayerFeedback False

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Status bApplyUpwardMomentum True

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Status CharacterDamageTypeModifierAttribute AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.DamageTypeModifers.AmpStatusEffectDamageModifier'

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Status MaxDamageRadius 0.100000

                    set GD_Amp.DamageType.DmgType_Amp_Status MinDamagePercent 0.750000

                #</Status Damage (Slag DoT damage)>

                #<Status Effect Attributes (Slag Status Effect duration / etc)>

                    set GD_Amp.StatusEffect.Status_Amp BaseDuration (BaseValueConstant=8.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    set GD_Amp.StatusEffect.Status_Amp BaseSpreadTimeInterval (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    set GD_Amp.StatusEffect.Status_Amp BaseSpreadDistanceFromSource (BaseValueConstant=48.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    set GD_Amp.StatusEffect.Status_Amp BaseSpreadCap (BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    set GD_Amp.StatusEffect.Status_Amp TargetStatusEffectChanceModifier (BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.StatusEffectModifiers.AmpChanceResistanceModifier',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    set GD_Amp.StatusEffect.Status_Amp TargetStatusEffectDurationModifier (BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.StatusEffectModifiers.AmpDurationResistanceModifier',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                    set GD_Amp.StatusEffect.Status_Amp DamageSurfaceChanceModifiers ((SurfaceType=DMGSURFACE_Generic,BaseChance=(BaseValueConstant=15.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),BaseSpreadChance=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),SpreadChanceDecayMultiplier=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(SurfaceType=DMGSURFACE_Flesh,BaseChance=(BaseValueConstant=15.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),BaseSpreadChance=(BaseValueConstant=20.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),SpreadChanceDecayMultiplier=(BaseValueConstant=0.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(SurfaceType=DMGSURFACE_Armor,BaseChance=(BaseValueConstant=15.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),BaseSpreadChance=(BaseValueConstant=10.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),SpreadChanceDecayMultiplier=(BaseValueConstant=0.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(SurfaceType=DMGSURFACE_Shield,BaseChance=(BaseValueConstant=7.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),BaseSpreadChance=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000),SpreadChanceDecayMultiplier=(BaseValueConstant=0.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                #</Slag DoT on Card>

                #<Splash Damage DoT Fixes>

                    set GD_Aster_RaidWeapons.SMGs.Bullet_SMG_Plasma_Florentine:Behavior_Explode_5 StatusEffectDamage (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectDamage',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

        #<MakeVendorsGreatAgain2017>

            #<Description+Features>

                ###############################################################################################

                # By Jim Raven                                                                                #

                # Makes all vendors Great By changing whites to blues and greens to purples                   #

                # Features                                                                                    #

                # Weapon vendors Now have a 10% chance at legendary IOTD Else Purple                          #

                # Health vendors Now have a 10% chance at legendary IOTD Else Purple                          #

                # Grenade vendors Now have a 10% chance at legendary IOTD Else Purple                         #

                # Adds Relics To Grenade vendors similar to how TPS has oz kits in grenade vendors            #

                # Relics have a lower spawn chance than nades in vendors                                      #

                # Ups The quantity of grenade vendors from 3-6 to 7-8                                         #

                # Added option to not have relics in grenade vendors                                          #

                # Install using LightChaosMan's Filter tool! Unless you know how to merge Hotfixes yourself   #

                # This mod was made from scratch to finish with Light's Tool so a huge thanks to you good sir.#

                ###############################################################################################

            #</Description+Features>

            #<Weapons Vendor>

                #<Makes Whites to Blue and Greens To Purple>

        #<MoreChestsOnPandora>

            Borderlands 2 - More Chests On Pandora.                     Created by Hemaxhu.

            [Last Update - 02.11.2017]

            [Added FilterTool version, check my folder]

            This mod adds more chests to some locations. Some of them are sneaky, some are not.

            Also contains my additional chest mods.

            -----Vanilla Locations-----

             Hero's Pass: +2

             Southpaw Steam & Power: +1

             The Bunker: +2

             Opportunity: +2

             Caustic Caverns: +2

             Bloodshot Stronghold: +1

             Bloodshot Ramparts: +3

             Arid Nexus - Badlands: +3 (1 white chest)

             Arid Nexus - Boneyard: +4

             HighLands: +3

             FrostBurn Canyon: +1

             Three Horns - Divide: +2

             Three Horns - Valley: +2

             Terramorphous Lair: +4

             Vault Of The Warrior: +3

             Thousand Cuts: +2

             Eridium Blight: +6 (3 white chests)

             SawTooth Cauldron: +3

             End Of The Line: +2 (1 Hyperion weapon locker)

             Tundra Express: +2

             The Dust: +3

             The Fridge: +3

             HighLands - Outwash: +3 (1 special chest)

             Wildlife Exploitation Preserve: +2

             Control Core Angel: +3 (1 white)

             LynchWood: +2

            DLC:

             Marcus's Mercenary Shop: +2

             Oasis: +7

            Bug Fix History:

            >Removed 'Tiny Brick'

            >Fixed "Bearer Of Bad News" mission glitch.

            >Removed additional Sanctuary Chest.

            >Fixed multiple sanctuary chests when you travel back in Sanctuary.

            >[Marcus's Mercenary Shop]: Fixed Wrong Gear lvl in additional chest.

            <|Other changes|>

            | Added "Better Roland's Armory 2.0" Mod| > Better loot quality. Increased Legendary chance.

            |Added "Better White Chests" Mod         | > You can find Legendary weapons in white chests.

            |Added "Better Mordecai Stash" Mod       | > Guaranteed Purple and Blue item, also chance for additional purple and blue items.

            | Control Core Angel: Removed chest lock|

        #<AmmoRegenOpportunityV2>

            #<Description>

                By Aaron0000

                Features;

                Changes the Lucrative Opportunity relic to regenerate ammo (excluding rocket launchers and grenades).

            #</Description>

            #<Code>

                set GD_Artifacts.A_Item_Unique.Artifact_Opportunity AttributeSlotEffects ((SlotName="Effect1",bExternalSlot=True,bRunEffectsAsSkill=False,AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCurrentWeaponAmmoRegenerationMultiplier',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Artifacts.BalanceAttributes.Init_ModifierBase_Linear',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.010000),PerGradeUpgrade=(BaseValueConstant=0.020000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.0000000),bIncludeInFunStats=False,bIncludeAlliesAsTarget=False,bEnforceMinimumGrade=False,bEnforceMaximumGrade=False,MinimumGrade=0,MaximumGrade=12,TargetInstanceDataName=)))

                set GD_Artifacts.Body.Body_Opportunity:AttributePresentationDefinition_0 Description Increases [skill]ammo regeneration[-skill].

                set GD_Artifacts.A_Item_Unique.Artifact_Opportunity UIStatList ((bDisplayAsModifierOnly=True,AttributeStyle=ATTRSTYLE_ModifierText,SupplementalAttributeStyle=ATTRSTYLE_JustNumber,StatCombinationMethod=SCM_Multiply,Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCurrentWeaponAmmoRegenerationMultiplier',ConstraintAttribute=None,SupplementalAttributeExpression=(AttributeOperand1=None,ComparisonOperator=OPERATOR_EqualTo,Operand2Usage=OPERAND_PreferAttribute,AttributeOperand2=None,ConstantOperand2=0.000000),SupplementalAttributeToAppend=None))

            #</Code>

        #</AmmoRegenOpportunityV2>

        #<GrogNozzleMissionReward>

            By Jim Raven

            Makes Grog Nozzle A mission reward of "The Beard Makes The Man" quest

            #</Nasty Surprise>

            #<Rolling Thunder>

                #<Bounce explosion radius increase & no self damage>

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Projectiles.Grenade_Rubberized:BehaviorProviderDefinition_1.Behavior_Explode_44 DamageRadiusFormula (BaseValueConstant=819.000000)

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Projectiles.Grenade_Rubberized:BehaviorProviderDefinition_1.Behavior_Explode_44 InstigatorSelfDamageScale 0.000000

                #</Bounce explosion radius increase & no self damage>

                #<Damage Increase>

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Delivery.Delivery_RollingThunder ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GrenadeMod.GrenadeDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.300000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                #</Damage Increase>

            #</Rolling Thunder>

            #<Homing>

                #<Double projectile speed>

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Projectiles.Grenade_homing speedformula (Basevalueconstant=1400.000000)

                #</Double projectile speed>

            #</Homing>

            #<Kiss of Death>

                set GD_GrenadeMods.Projectiles.Grenade_Homing:BehaviorProviderDefinition_1.Behavior_CauseDamage_2 DamageFormula (BaseValueScaleConstant=2.000000)

                set GD_GrenadeMods.Payload.Payload_KissOfDeath ItemAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GrenadeMod.BlastRadius',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.800000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GrenadeMod.GrenadeDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.400000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GrenadeMod.FuseTime',ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=10.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

            #</Kiss of Death>

            #<MIRV>

                set GD_GrenadeMods.Projectiles.Grenade_MirvChild UpwardVelocityBonus -50.000000

                set GD_GrenadeMods.Projectiles.Grenade_MirvChild GravityScaling 1.000000

            #</MIRV>

            #<Orudeon's GrenadeTweaks>

                Enhances most common grenade types to improve usability or brand differentiation. This mod is designed for use with the_Nocturni's Better Grenades but may be used standalone. You may load them in any order, however any mod that alters ExternalAttributeEffects or AttributeSlotUpgrades on grenade materials is incompatible with this mod.

                Coded by: Orudeon

                #<Bandit>

                    Bandit grenades increase grenade capacity (+2 for white, +3 for Green, +4 for Blue/Fustercluck, +5 for Purple)

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit_2_Uncommon ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit_3_Rare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Bandit_4_VeryRare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Title.Title_SkyRocket ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanMaxValue',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                #</Bandit>

                #<Dahl>

                    Increases common Dahl grenade damage by half a rarity.

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Dahl_4_VeryRare AttributeSlotUpgrades (SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False)

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Dahl_3_Rare AttributeSlotUpgrades (SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False)

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Dahl_2_Uncommon AttributeSlotUpgrades (SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False)

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Dahl AttributeSlotUpgrades (SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=False)

                #</Dahl>

                #<Torgue>

                    Increases common Torgue grenade child count by one, to a total of three over similar-part Bandit grenades..

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Torgue AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="ChildCount",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Torgue_2_Uncommon AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="ChildCount",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Torgue_3_Rare AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="ChildCount",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Torgue_4_VeryRare AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="ChildCount",GradeIncrease=3,bActivateSlot=False))

                #</Torgue>

                #<Tediore>

                    Tediore grenades replenish over time, starting at one every twenty seconds for whites, going all the way to one every ten seconds for purples. This data is included from Tediore Brand Overhaul.

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.05,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior_2_Uncommon ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.0625,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior_3_Rare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.0769231,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                    set GD_GrenadeMods.Material.Material_Tedior_4_VeryRare ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Ammo_Grenade_Protean.Ammo_Grenade_ProteanActiveRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.1,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000))

                #</Tediore>

                #<Maliwan>

                    Increases the O-Negative's Child Grenade count by five (to a range of eleven to thirteen) while reverting the fuse timer change introduced in the Unofficial Community Patch to counter the child grenade and power increase. This data is included from Maliwan Brand Tweaks.

                    #<Fuse Timer>

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.ONegative.Iris_Seraph_GrenadeMod_ONegative_Part_Damage7 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=7,bActivateSlot=True))

                        set GD_Iris_SeraphItems.ONegative.Iris_Seraph_GrenadeMod_ONegative_Part_Damage6 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="Damage",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True))

                    #</Fuse Timer>

            - Credit:

            - Aaron0000: Giving me a code to make the Buffalo spawn with sights and helping me with Rocket Launcher FiringMode.

            - ItsCoolDood: Giving me his amazing skin for the Hornet (replaced to Teapot) and helping with the Bellona / Volcano skin.

            - Note:

            - The Red Text of the Volcano is "RIP Kaylee, 1988 - 2017". I did this because my sister passed away in 2014 and the Volcano (replaced to Bellona) is a tribute to her.

            - Execute this in main menu, if you have the versions from my gun farmed legit, it'll get deleted if u don't execute this in the main menu because of sanity check.

            - Don't gib the Menhit / Roaster with anything except the Maliwan Grip, sanity check won't enjoy it ;)

            - Perses / Orc is Non-Elemental only, if you gib this with an element sanity check will delete it.

            - If you gib the Menerva / Sloth, gib it with a Bayonet, non-bayonet prefix's get deleted.

            - Incase you don't know how to gib the Buffalo with a sight and element, here's a template: BL2(hwAAAABAcwCEKIRBBgGFBoFZAOMMZgVMBRgbMGBg/v8rg9EDIw3m)

            - Teapot is non-elemental, here's a template: BL2(hwAAAACz4QCBBwZABAGF7sSIhdEUowHG/38JGB0w/v/fxPCCQRTj)

            - Volcano is non-elemental, here's a template: BL2(hwAAAAAO9QCDyINBEAGFioJZAOMKpgWMBRguMGRg/v+/gnkEowvm)

            - Heartbreaker / Aphrodite is ALL element. If you gib it, change Elemental_None to Elemental_Fire, Elemental_Corrosive, Elemental_Slag, Elemental_Shock

            - Changelog v2.7:

            - New gun:

            - Added Menerva (Sniper)

            - Loot pool:

            - Menerva is farmable from McNally.

            - Balance changes:

            - Nerfed Menhit Reload

            - Melee Rapier is now 200% (Forgot to add it to the gun.)

            - Buffed Vrirta fire rate

            - Buffed Vrirta weapon spread

            - Skin changes:

            - Changed Vrirta appearance

            - Changelog v2.6:

            - Bug Fixes:

            - Fixed an issue where the Aphrodite accuracy decreased itself to 0 in Zer0's Deception skill.

            - Balance changes:

            - Buffed Phonoi splash.

            - Nerfed Menhit Reload Speed.

            - Nerfed Menhit Accuracy.

            - Nerfed Menhit Damage.

            - Buffed Aphrodite Mag Size by 2.

            - Nerfed Aphrodite Base Damage.

            - Aphrodite's Surprise (Conference Call Childs after a certain distance) now gets childs from a further distance.

            - Nerfed Bellona Damage.

            - Skin changes:

            - Phonoi is now Black & Yellow. (Removed the decal, it was bugged.)

            - Gave the Aphrodite E-Tech Sounds & Barrel.

            - Gave the Aphrodite a pink elemental color when it's non-elemental.

            - Changelog v2.5:

            - Balance changes:

            - Nerfed Hera base damage.

            - Nerfed Perses base damage.

            - Nerfed Phonoi base damage.

            - Nerfed Bellona base damage and elemental effect chance.

            - Buffed Ares base damage and passive health regen.

            - Buffed Hades base damage and fire rate.

            - Nerfed Enyo base damage.

            - Buffed Menhit base damage.

            - Skin changes:

            - Added reflect to Perses Gray channel.

            - Made the Hades skin look more demonic and bandit feel instead of the revamped standard bone shredder.

            - Changed the Anhur skin to feel more like a Moxxi weapon since it's replacing a Moxxi weapon. (Rubi)

            - Extras:

            - Changed the name Anann to Anu, to not be confused with people since Anu's 2nd name is Anann.

            - Changelog v2:

            - New guns:

            - Added Aphrodite (SG)

            - Added Vrirta (AR)

            - Added Perses (SMG)

            - Added Phonoi (Pistol)

            - Added Bellona (Sniper)

            - Added Enyo (Rocket Launcher)

            - Balance changes:

            - Buffed Anann with more damage and clip size.

            - Skin changes:

            - Changed the Bandit Barrel from Menhit to a Torgue Barrel

            Weapons:

            - Pistols:

            - Anhur > Replaces Rubi

            - Phonoi > Replaces Teapot

            - Assault Rifles:

            - Anu > Replaces Rapier

            - Vritra > Replaces Stomper

            - Sniper Rifles:

            - Hera > Replaces Buffalo

            - Bellona > Replaces Volcano

            - Menerva > Replaces Sloth

            - SMGs:

            - Hades > Replaces Bone Shredder

            - Perses > Replaces Orc

            - Shotguns:

            - Ares > Replaces Dog

            - Aphrodite > Replaces Heartbreaker

            - Rocket Launchers:

            - Menhit > Replaces Roaster

            - Enyo > Replaces 12 pounder

            Weapon behaviors:

            - Anhur:

            - Grants 20% swap speed on all weapons.

            - Healing when damaging enemies.

            - Critical boosted by 100%

            - High elemental effect chance.

            - Burst on zoom in.

            - Anu:

            - Healing when damage dealt

            - 100% Critical Hit Damage.

            - High elemental effect chance

            - Boosts melee to 200%

            - Removed extra melee damage taken

            - Boosted fire rate

            - Hera:

            - 150% Critical Hit Damage

            - Boosted fire rate

            - Available in all elements

            - Hades:

            - Accuracy is 100, but spread still widens the more you shoot.

            - +50% Critical Hit Damage

            - Dog:

            - Passive health regen when held.

            - Grants 25% movement speed

            - Increased mag

            - Accuracy works a bit different ;)

            - Menhit:

            - Increased elemental effect chance.

            - Burst fire when zoomed in. (3 burst)

            - Healing when damage dealt on zoom in.

            - Buffed fire rate

            - Buffed reload speed

            - Buffed mag size by 1

            - Aphrodite:

            - Healing when damage dealt

            - Are you ready for a little surprise?

            - Buffed fire rate

            - Buffed damage

            - Available in all elements

            - Buffed mag size by 4

            - Vritra:

            - Buffed damage

            - Decreased fire rate

            - Increased clip size.

            - Perses:

            - Explosive damage (Yes, this means Explosive Relics, Skills etc do affect it.)

            - Only available in Non-Element

            - Buffed damage

            - Buffed fire rate

            - Buffed recoil

            - Tighter spread

            - Phonoi:

            - Kaboom!...

            - Explosive Damage

            - Buffed magazine size

            - Buffed recoil

            - Bellona:

            - 4 Elements; corrosive, slag, fire and explosion.

            - Burst fire when zoomed in. (3-Burst)

            - No recoil.

            - Buffed mag size by 6.

            - Enyo:

            - Buffed mag size by 4.

            - Rocket launcher regens 1 rocket every 10 seconds.

            - Buffed fire rate.

            - Menerva:

            - 150% Crit Damage when zoomed in.

            - Fully automatic on hipfire.

            - Jakobs effect on zoom in.

            - Pierces through enemies.

        #<FirehawkV3>

            #<Description>

                By Aaron0000

                Turns the Little Evie into a recreation of the Borderlands 1 Firehawk.

                Features;

                Projectiles are hawks, just like the Sand Hawk.

                Reduced base damage.

                Increased damage over time and chance.

                Slightly increased accuracy.

                +40% critical hit damage.

                Spawns only in fire, but will not delete shock versions if you have them.

                Retains Little Evie cooldown effect.

            #</Description>

            #<Code>

            #</Code>

        #</FirehawkV3>

        #<LemniscateV2>

            A weapon.. pack, made by:              \

            _    _  _____  _   _  _    _  _    _  |

            | |  | || ____|| | | || |  | || |  | | |

            | |  | || | __ | \_/ || |  | || |  | | |

            | |  | || ||_ | \   / | |  | || |  | | |

            | |__| || |_| |  | |  | |__| || |__| | |

            |______||_____|  |_|  |______||______| |

            /

            ______________________________________/

            This mod makes it so that all the Vladof legendaries have infinite ammo, along with some additional changes. Includes balancing.

            [Notes]

            All these weapons are now usable on Gaige as well, due to 2 clip size instead of 1. Keep in mind the infinity might not be usefull on her.

            [Features]

            (Endless) Shredifier: Slightly lowered fire rate, damage might be lower as well.

            Fires slow moving bullets that explode on impact, making it able to deal dual-elemental damage.

            Increases movement speed.

            Fires in the shape of a circle, because circles have no start nor an end. (Infinity refference)

            Infinity: Buffed damage and fire rate.

            Fires etech assault rifle bullets.

            Ricochets once and splits into 3 more projectiles on ricochet.

            Bullets penetrate targets (But it's ricochet projectiles do not)

            (Limitless) Mongol: Lowered damage and fire rate.

            Fires the same projectiles, but the child projectiles spread in a much thinner path.

            Inaccurate.

            (Apeiron) Lyuda / White Death / Lyudmilla:

            Lowered damage by at least 30%.

            Lowered fire rate.

            Increased accuracy.

            Better splitting; Splits into 4 more projectiles in a + shape and also splits earlier.

            Slower projectile speed.

            [Codes]

            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Barrel.AR_Barrel_Vladof_Shredifier CustomFiringModeDefinition FiringModeDefinition'GD_Weap_Pistol.FiringModes.Bullet_Pistol_Hyperion_Fibber_1'

            set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Barrel.AR_Barrel_Vladof_Shredifier AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="AccuracyMin",GradeIncrease=999,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="AccuracyMax",GradeIncrease=16,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=22,bActivateSlot=True))

        #</LemniscateV2>

        #<Bluebird>

            ########## Bluebird - The ultimate slaging utility weapon. Meant to compete with/replace the Grog Nozzle. ##########

            ## 99.9% slag chance

            ## 60% faster swap speed to and from it.

            ## 85% life steal.

            ## A 250% type B critical hit bonus for Gunzerkers.

            ## 1 bullet richochet to help out Gaige.

            ## A VERY large slag splash radius.

            ## Replaces the Chulainn - Received as a mission reward from "Clan War: Zafords vs. Hodunks" when siding with the Zaford family.

            ## Perfect Gibbed Code: BL2(hwAAAAATYwBDiANBEAGFemIxwUKNBQGLChYILBVY/v8jYynCko3l)

            ## By Rhysand

            ## Name and Description

            set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Title.Title__Unique_Chulainn PartName Bluebird

            set GD_Weap_SMG.Name.Title.Title__Unique_Chulainn:AttributePresentationDefinition_8 NoConstraintText I will never leave you, not in a million years.

            set GD_Weap_SMG.ManufacturerMaterials.Mat_Maliwan_3_Chulainn WeaponCardAttributes ((Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',PriorityIncrease=3.000000),(Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',PriorityIncrease=3.000000),(Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.DamageEnhancementModifiers.PlayerConvertDamageToHealingPercent',PriorityIncrease=1.50000),(Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCriticalHitBonus',PriorityIncrease=2.50000))

            ## Weapon Changes

            set GD_Weap_SMG.Barrel.SMG_Barrel_Chulainn WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAdditionalRicochets',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponStatusEffectChanceModifier',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4.172000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

        #<Billionaire v2.1>

            #---------------------------- Change Log --------------------------#

            #v2.1 - Damage Decreased for balencing

            #v2 - NOW SPAWNS MONEY WHEN YOU KILL ENEMIES

            #Because billionaire, obviously.

            #The gun that pays for itself.

            #v1.1 - Small tweak to the weapon skin.

            #v1 - Initial Release

            #--------------------- Weapon Information ---------------------#

            #Replaces the YellowJacket SMG

            #Heres a GIB code for you for the one I use: BL2(hwAAAAD++gRCiIAJDYFEpmI5weKAcgELC5b//xZY/v9DoFTC8oDy)

            #Feel free to change the parts around if you want.

            #I use a Non-Elemental one, but it's not locked or anything, so you can use a Shock one if you wish too. That will make this weapon Duel element Fire/Shock

            #Meant to Represent Marvel's Ironman. AKA Tony Stark

            #Small increase to damage, fire rate and magazine size

            #Greatly increased projectile speed. (Because wow the yellowjacket had such slow bullet speed. What even.)

            #Fires 3 projectiles per shot at the cost of 2 ammo per shot

            #Grants a 25% bonus to both movement speed and jump height

            #Projectiles will cause a fire explosion on impact with enemies or surfaces

            #Etech flaps extend a bit faster. Simply an aesthetic choice.

            #Now MONEY rarity (yellow)

            #(Note: If you run this mod alongside the Incredible Hulk, the rarity will instead be acid green. This will be fixed later so they will be compatible)

            #Changed the firing sounds so it somewhat resembles Ironman's Repulser beams

            #Custom skin!

            #Stats

            set GD_Sage_Weapons.SMG.SMG_Barrel_Alien_YellowJacket WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.200000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.350000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.200000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponPerShotAccuracyImpulse',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-4.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectileSpeedMultiplier',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=50.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

        #<Bloodwing>

            ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

            |                                            |

            |            Created by CzRSpecV             |

            |                                            |

            |     Turns the Cobra into the Bloodwing     |

            |                                            |

            ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

            ## IMPORTANT NOTES ##

            This weapon uses the Sandhawk's FiringMode, any mod that changes the Sandhawk WILL affect this mod.

            This Mod changes a couple of quests lootpools, and changes drop locations listed below:

            Animal Rights - Now Drops Bloodwing (Formerly Cobra) instead of Trespasser

            The Good, the Bad, and the Mordecai - Now Drops Trespasser instead of Moxxi's Endowment

            Moxxi's Tip Jar - Now has a 20% chance to be Moxxi's Endowment, 40% for both Bad Touch and Good Touch

            ## Cobra > Bloodwing ##

            Creators Notes:

            This was created to both remember, and re-live Bloodwing from Borderlands 1

            The elementals are ment to represent the artifacts from Borderlands 1 changing the element damage he did

            The ammo regen is ment to represent him dropping extra ammo for you on kills

            The health regen is ment to represent him dropping more health vials on kills

            "If it took more then one shot, you weren't using a Jakobs..." - This weapon does alot of damage but, it's fitting of it's title.

            Gun Changes:

            Sandhawk Projectile

            Peirces Shields

            Increased Firerate

            Increased Reload Speed

            +0.5 Ammo Regen / Second

            Heals you for +2.5% of Damage done when Aiming Down the Sights

            Spawns in Corrosive, Shock, Fire, and Normal

            Makes it a Legendary

            Skin Changes:

            Updated Barrel to be Jakobs

            Brand New Skin

            ##

            -- Rename and Red Text --

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.Name.Title.Title_Unique_Cobra PartName Bloodwing

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.Name.Title.Title_Unique_Cobra:AttributePresentationDefinition_8 NoConstraintText <font color="#e50026">Give 'em hell, Bloodwing!<font color="#ffffff"><br><font color="#ffffff">[funstat]<font color="#ffffff"> Bullets pass through <font color="#0a9bf5">Shields<font color="#ffffff"><br><font color="#ffffff">[funstat]<font color="#ffffff"> +2.5% <font color="#e50026">Lifesteal<font color="#ffffff"> when Aiming Down Sights<font color="#e50026"><br><font color="#ffffff">[funstat]<font color="#ffffff"> +0.5 Ammo Regen / Second<font color="#e50026"><br><font color="#ffffff">[funstat]<font color="#e50026"> "If it took more then one shot, you weren't using a Jakobs."

            -- Rarity Change --

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.SniperRifles.SR_Barrel_Dahl_Cobra rarity (BaseValueConstant=5.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

            -- General Attributes --

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.SniperRifles.SR_Barrel_Dahl_Cobra WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponReloadSpeed',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-2.00000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.80000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.SniperRifles.SR_Barrel_Dahl_Cobra ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AmmoResource_Sniper_Rifle.Ammo_Sniper_Rifle_RegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.50000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.DamageSourceShieldPenetration.PercentChanceInstigatedBulletDmgIgnoresShields',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=100.00000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.SniperRifles.SR_Barrel_Dahl_Cobra ZoomExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.DamageEnhancementModifiers.PlayerConvertDamageToHealingPercent',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.025000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

            -- Elemental Unlock --

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.SniperRifles.Sniper_Jakobs_3_Cobra:WeaponPartListCollectionDefinition_269 ElementalPartData (bEnabled=True,WeightedParts=((bDisabled=False,Part=WeaponPartDefinition'GD_Weap_SniperRifles.elemental.SR_Elemental_None',Manufacturers=,MinGameStageIndex=0,MaxGameStageIndex=1,DefaultWeightIndex=0),(bDisabled=False,Part=WeaponPartDefinition'GD_Weap_SniperRifles.elemental.SR_Elemental_Fire',Manufacturers=,MinGameStageIndex=0,MaxGameStageIndex=1,DefaultWeightIndex=0),(bDisabled=False,Part=WeaponPartDefinition'GD_Weap_SniperRifles.elemental.SR_Elemental_Corrosive',Manufacturers=,MinGameStageIndex=0,MaxGameStageIndex=1,DefaultWeightIndex=0),(bDisabled=False,Part=WeaponPartDefinition'GD_Weap_SniperRifles.elemental.SR_Elemental_Shock',Manufacturers=,MinGameStageIndex=0,MaxGameStageIndex=1,DefaultWeightIndex=0)))

            -- FiringMode --

            set GD_Iris_Weapons.SniperRifles.SR_Barrel_Dahl_Cobra CustomFiringModeDefinition FiringModeDefinition'GD_Orchid_BossWeapons.FiringModes.Bullet_SMG_SandHawk'

            -- Skin --

            #############################################################################################################################################################################################################

            Moxxstrasza V1.0

            The Moxxstrasza is effectively a flamethrower using the etech fire splatgun projectile and the fire dot and fire rate has been inreased to very high levels. Due to the projectile's tendency to kill the Player Character in one hit when using the Bee, I recommend using this without the Bee shield. A nice fun weapon for use against flesh enemies(far less effective against armor or shields, naturaly).

            Features:

            8% Damage to healing

            Massive fire dot

            12.5% Bullet Speed

            Ammo Regeneration, 4/s

            Reduced crit damage

            Fire Only

            Increased weapon spread

            In ADS:

            Burst Fire, 10 round burst

            100% Bullet Speed

            Smot's Weapon Usage Table

            (Values of -10 to 10 for all that apply, 10=Recommended/Required/Effective,0=Not Recommended/Unecessary/Ineffective,-10=Avoid)

            Melee Range:          -8

            Close Range:           8

            Medium Range:          10

            Long Range:            4

            Ultra Long Range:     -4

            Critical Hits:         0

            Amp Damage:            5

            Vs. Wrong Element:    -2

            Needs Slag Combo:      8

            Ammo Regen Speed:      8

            Health Regen:          5

            Vs. Flying Enemies:   -8

            Control Effects(CC):   N/A

            Other:                 9(Jumping)

            Compatibility Info:

            Changes Moxxi's Good Touch

            Uses this Firing Mode: GD_Weap_Shotgun.FiringModes.Bullets_Splatgun

            Change Logs:

            V1.0

            Weapon balancing/testing completed

            Pink on black /w magenta stripe skin complete

            Feedback:

            I feel this is already fairly polished and balanced, but if you find a bug, or feel the balance should changed, or would like an alternate skin, let me know via Github or Reddit PM.

            Credits:

            CzRSpecV's Gun Creation Guide - Thank you for making this, I would've had a vastly harder time building this weapon or any of my others.

            Dave's Skin Modding Guide - A truly awesome guide for skins, I probably wouldn't have been able make anything close to this weapon's skin('s) without it.

            Credit to xmngr for e-tech flap effects from the Alpha Draconis(See Sound/Effects).

            Credit to Dave and his Pocket Vaccum, which provided insight into switching weapon projectiles.

            #############################################################################################################################################################################################################

        #<GearboxGunsPlus>

            #<Description>

                By Aaron0000

                Spruces up the Gearbox guns and the Basic Repeater.

                Features;

                Changes the rarity of the Gearbox weapons to Blue.

                Buffs the stats of the Gearbox guns (and the Basic Repeater to a lesser degree).

                Gearbox Assault Rifle has a 20% chance to fire an extra bullet.

                Gearbox SMG behaves similarly to the Bitch (minus the bonus crit dmage).

                Gearbox Sniper Rifle has increased projectile speed.

                Basic Repeater has a burst-fire of five rounds.

            #</Description>

            #<Code>

                #<Assault Rifle>

                    set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Body.AR_Body_Gearbox_1 rarity (basevalueattribute=none)

                    set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Body.AR_Body_Gearbox_1 rarity (BaseValueConstant=3)

                    set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Body.AR_Body_Gearbox_1 WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.00000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponExtraShotChance',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.200000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Body.AR_Body_Gearbox_1 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=12,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True))

                #</Assault Rifle>

                #<Submachine Gun>

                    set GD_Weap_SMG.Body.SMG_Body_Gearbox_1 rarity (basevalueattribute=none)

                    set GD_Weap_SMG.Body.SMG_Body_Gearbox_1 rarity (BaseValueConstant=3)

                    set GD_Weap_SMG.Body.SMG_Body_Gearbox_1 WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponPerShotAccuracyImpulse',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Hyperion',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-1.000000)))

                    set GD_Weap_SMG.Body.SMG_Body_Gearbox_1 ExternalAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AccuracyResourcePool.AccuracyMaxValue',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=ResourcePoolAttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.AccuracyResourcePool.AccuracyOnIdleRegenerationRate',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-2.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    set GD_Weap_SMG.Body.SMG_Body_Gearbox_1 AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=12,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True))

                #</Submachine Gun>

                #<Sniper Rifle>

                    set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Body.SR_Body_Gearbox rarity (basevalueattribute=none)

                    set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Body.SR_Body_Gearbox rarity (BaseValueConstant=3)

                    set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Body.SR_Body_Gearbox WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.900000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectileSpeedMultiplier',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                    set GD_Weap_SniperRifles.Body.SR_Body_Gearbox AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=12,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=4,bActivateSlot=True))

                #</Sniper Rifle>

                #<Starter Pistol>

                    set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Bandit_CrappyStarter WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.000000)))

                    set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Bandit_CrappyStarter ZoomWeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAutomaticBurstCount',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=3.000000)))

                    set GD_Weap_Pistol.Barrel.Pistol_Barrel_Bandit_CrappyStarter AttributeSlotUpgrades ((SlotName="WeaponDamage",GradeIncrease=6,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponMagSize",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=True),(SlotName="WeaponSpread",GradeIncrease=2,bActivateSlot=True))

                #</Starter Pistol>

            #</Code>

        #</GearboxGunsPlus>

        #<Experience_Multiplier>

            set globals BaseEnemyExperienceFormula (BaseValueScaleConstant=1.7)

        #</Experience_Multiplier>

        #<Melee_Enhancement>

            set WillowPlayerController Loader.TheWorld:PersistentLevel.WillowPlayerController_2 MeleeAttackTargetFromBehindDamageModifierBaseValue 2

            set WillowPlayerController Loader.TheWorld:PersistentLevel.WillowPlayerController_2 InstigatedMeleeDamageModifierBaseValue 1.5

        #</Melee_Enhancement>

        #<More Loaders On Pandora 2.0>

            Borderlands 2 - More Loaders On Pandora. Now it's actually works.

            This mod changes:

             Loaders spawn limit.

             Amount of Loaders per spawn.

             Wilhelm Health.

            And Adds:

             New Loader's spawn list to a Wilhelm.

            Affected Maps:

             Almost all maps.

            Affected DLC:

             Torgue DLC.

            Affected NPC's:

            Loaders

        #</More Loaders On Pandora 2.0>

        #<1moreanimals>

            Borderlands 2 - More Animals.

            This mod increases:

             Animals spawn limit.

             Amount of Animals per spawn.

            Affected Maps:

             Almost all maps.

             Affects some Dlc's, but not all of them. (Not sure about: Torgue, Scarlett)

            Affected NPC's:

             Stalkers

             Threshers

             Skags

             Spiderants

             Rakks

             BullyMongs

            -Fixed 1st liar's berg mission bug. (Deleted additional spawns)

            -Fixed Multiple Mothrakks

            #<patch>

    #<patchnotes>

        #<ptch>

            #Weapon Manufacturer Changes<off>

            #Standardizes Dahl burst count among common weapons to reduce part dependency and buffs underperforming gun types.<off>

            #Gives all Hyperion common weapons and some uniques a 10% multiplicative crit damage buff. Excludes the Bitch, the Bane, the Lady Fist, the Fibber (Only affects the Shotgun barrel), the Interfacer, and the Conference call. Red text weapons do not reflect this on their card.<off>

            #Improves competitiveness of several Jakobs guns. Gives assault rifles full-auto. Hammerlock guns now sport perfect accuracy, high crit bonuses, and DPS similar to a full Jakobs Muckamuck to give them a unified Sniper theme.<off>

            #All Maliwan products excluding Sniper Rifles receive quality of life changes or in the case of rocket launchers, a substantial redesign.<off>

            #Improved Maliwan pistol fire rate and clip size.<off>

            #Rebalances several guns in the Vladof brand to make them more competitive or more reasonable.<off>

            #All Tediore weapons have received a redesign and combat tweaks. In addition to improving general combat usage of all four weapon types, all Tediore products (including grenades and rocket launchers) now innately have ammo regeneration that scales with rarity thanks to Tediore's digistruct technology. (Thank you to Aaron0000 for permission to incorporate Tediore REGENdaries.)<off>

            #Lots of small Torgue changes. Double Projectile speed, Explosion Radius for Pistols. Legendary Weapon improvements.<off>

            #Spiker Weapons<off>

            #Redesigns Spikers (E-Tech pistols) into hand-held micro-rocket launchers. All spikers deal heavily increased damage, explode sooner, and now deal your choice of Reaper, Grenade, or Rocket (vanilla) splash.<off>

            #To compensate for this dramatic increase in damage, Bandit, Dahl, and Vladof Spikers have higher recoil, higher burst delay, and lower fire rate (respectively) to keep them in line with other brands while retaining their brand signature.<off>

            #Additionally, Maliwan spikers have massively increased elemental chance and damage at the expense of lower DPS.<off>

            #Dart Weapons<off>

            #Replaces Darts with Laser Pistols, which have 25% additive critical damage, pierce enemies, and bounce off surfaces once (twice if Hyperion).<off>

            #Dahl: Shotgun mode when ADS<off>

            #Hyperion: Extra surface bounce. Also extra crit when combined with Gear Overhaul<off>

            #Maliwan: High DoT chance and damage<off>

            #Bandit: Extra shot chance when combined with Gear Overhaul<off>

            #Vladof: It fires fast I guess<off>

            #Tediore: Regenerates ammo when combined with Gear overhaul<off>

            #Relics (Incoming wall of text)<off>

            #Massively buffs the statistics of Aggression relics to allow them to compete with similar relics.<off>

            #Dramatically increased the potency of Proficiency relics to compete with Bones of the Ancients.<off>

            #Redesigns the Might of the Seraphs to increase reload speed and fire rate with all weapons. Also increases movement speed. Requires UCP.<off>

            #Stockpile relics now add an absolute value of ammo, increasing usefulness at all points of gameplay. Additionally, all Stockpile relics now provide an enormous upgrade over Blood of the Ancients' ammo pools.<off>

            #Blood of the Ancients now add an absolute value of ammo. Additionally, all now provide more ammo than you could have gotten with a max quality percent-based one for a net upgrade to all ammo pools.<off>

            #Note: To get the final 'even' numbers, fractional bullets are granted at some upgrade levels. Your stockpile relic or Blood of the Ancients may grant unusual numbers below maximum quality.<off>

            #AngrierPat redesigned the Friendship Amulet to grant all team members (including yourself) +10% damage, maximum and minimum accuracy, weapon spread, reload speed, and magazine size, stacking with itself up to +40% to all stats.<off>

            #Increases the effectiveness of Elemental relics to allow them to compete with Bones of the Ancients.<off>

            #Changes Allegiance relics so blue and purple Allegiance relics often have all three attributes instead of two randomly selected ones.<off>

            #WARNING: Violates Sanity check. Probably deletes all existing Allegiance relics. Do not load affected save files without activating this mod first. Check included Gibbed codes.<off>

            #Increases the effectiveness of Protection relics to 71% shield capacity/recharge rate and adds 44.5% recharge delay at maximum quality to compete with Skin of the Ancients.<off>

            #Resistance relics now spawn with standardized resistance percents, now also grants resistance to dot elemental damage, and reduces your chance to be affected by dots (in addition to resisting impact damage).<off>

            #The Bone of the Ancients now comes in Explosive, Slag, and Melee/Melee Override Cooldown. Framework coded by SirUmnei and used/altered with permission.<off>

            #WARNING: Violates Sanity check. Deletes all existing Bones of the Ancients. Do not load affected save files without activating this mod first. Check included Gibbed codes.<off>

            #Skin of the Ancients now spawns with standardized resistance percents, now also grants resistance to dot elemental damage and reduces your chance to be affected by dots (in addition to resisting impact damage) and now always spawns with all three shield stats.<off>

            #WARNING: Violates Sanity check. Probably deletes all existing Skins of the Ancients. Do not load affected save files without activating this mod first.<off>

            #To adjust existing Skins of the Ancients, use Gibbed to change the BetaPart to Effect7. No other parts may have Effect7.<off>

            #Redesigns the Blood of the Seraphs to subtract a large portion of health in exchange for a very large chunk of constantly active health regeneration. Thank you to AngrierPat for the idea.<off>

            #Tenacity, Vitality, and Heart of the Ancients relics have optional vanilla-style changes or Aaron0000's Agility Relic designs incorporated.<off>

            #Skills<off>

            #Krieg and Salvador have MASSIVE Skill changes, too many to list.<off>

            #Anarchy Stacks differently<off>

            #Zer0 has his melee skills buffed by a significant margin<off>

            #Lots of stat based changes to All characters<off>

            #Most skills can be applied to 10, gain 2 points per level<off>

            #World Changes<off>

            #Vending machines will only sell blue/purples.<off>

            #Item of the day can be a Legendary at 10% if a purple spawns there.<off>

            #More loot chests around Pandora.  Most chests will have better loot and much less white items at higher levels<off>

            #30% increased experience gain<off>

            #Gold Key Chest does not require keys, but 30 Eridium<off>

            #Eridium, shield boosters, and other money based item pick ups are auto picked up<off>

            #Globally, melee damage is increased<off>

            #2x damage from behind<off>

            #2x damage from critical hits<off>

            #50% more base damage<off>

            #Enemy HP/Damage does NOT scale with number of players, but has been increased overall<off>

            #Increased enemy spawns by at least 4x.  No cap to number of enemies rendered.<off>

            #Weapon Part Changes<off>

            #Sniper<off>

            #Replaces the accuracy accessory of Sniper Rifles. Changes it to slowly regenerate ammo instead of increasing accuracy.<off>

            #Comes with custom prefixes: Jakobs = Bountiful, Dahl =Munitional, Hyperion = Rational, Maliwan = Prepared, Vladof = Production.<off>

            #Launcher<off>

            #Buffed Reload accessory<off>

            #Buffed Swap speed accessory<off>

            #Accuracy Accessory give ammo regen instead of accuracy<off>

            #SMG<off>

            #Stability Accessory combined with Accuracy Accessory, Buffed<off>

            #Accuracy accessory to Critical chance<off>

            #Buff fire rate accessory slightly with a damage buff<off>

            #Buff to reload accessory to have larger mag size and more reload speed<off>

            #Shotgun<off>

            #General buffs to all parts<off>

            #Assault Rifle<off>

            #Stability and Accuracy combined<off>

            #Mag accessory given reload speed<off>

            #Accuracy accessory to critical chance<off>

            #Bullet speed has small ammo regen<off>

            #Pistol<off>

            #General buffs to all parts<off>

            #All Weapons<off>

            #Bayonets take up slot 2 of the accessory portion of a weapon, allowing a different accessory to be used there<off>

            #Shields<off>

            #Buffs most shield types (sometimes majorly) to improve overall usability and help specialized or common shields compete with generalized and unique-or-better ones. This mod is designed to be used with Shield Stat Tweaks and requires the Unofficial Community Patch v3.1 or better for Amp shield functionality.<off>

            #Redesigns common Amp Shields to constantly regenerate, apply Amp and drain every shot insofar as there's enough shield to drain, and triples common Amp shield Amp damage to help them better compete with The Bee. Please thank LightChaosman for coding the Amp/Drain on every shot behavior.<off>

            #Alters all Nova shields' basic stats to fulfill a new design paradigm: rapid depletion, fairly rapid recharge, enormous radius, and high damage for frequent explosions. Explosive novas inherit a larger damage bonus due to not having element matching.<off>

            #Increases the damage and recharge rate of Spike shields, reduces recharge delay, and grants them 50% melee resistance to fulfill their intended use easier. Explosive Spike shields inherit a larger portion of damage due to being incapable of element-matching.<off>

            #Tweaks absorb shields to have a much higher absorb chance at the expense of taking 20% of damage from absorbed shots instead of no damage. The Sponge and Sham continue to absorb 100% of damage with unchanged absorb chances.<off>

        #</ptch>

    #</patchnotes>

#</patch>
